Place this small tungsten-backed plastique explosive against any door to blow the lock right off.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Don't get left out in the cold just because you forgot your key. This trusty shaped-charge will solve all your problems. Place this small tungsten-backed plastique explosive against any door to blow the lock right off.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Armorshield ultra-light flak jacket is a highly protective sleeveless vest with a neck protector and pelvic plate. Its Velcro fasteners are concealed on the sides.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Armorshield ultra-light flak jacket was designed to be as light and thin as possible without compromising maximum protection. It's a sleeveless vest with a neck protector, pelvic plate, and no front openings as its Velcro fasteners are concealed on the sides.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Armorshield ultra-light flak jacket was dipped in Compound 18 for anti-ballistic type protection. This sleeveless vest comes equipped with neck and pelvic plate protectors.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Better than average protection-the Armorshield ultra-light flak jacket dipped in Compound 18 offer true anti-ballistic type protection. This sleeveless vest comes equipped with neck and pelvic plate protectors.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Armorshield ultra-light flak jacket with neck protector and pelvic plate was coated with jelly from the queen Crepitus to improve its protectiveness.

The ballistic panels on this vest are made from 28 piles of Kevlar. It wraps around your shoulders, neck and sides, and includes a stowable groin protector. The waist and chest straps are fully adjustable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This vest offers 28 piles of Kevlar for better than average anti-ballistic type protection. It provides full protective coverage as it wraps around the shoulders, neck and sides, and includes a stowable groin protector. The waist and chest straps are fully adjustable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This vest's ballistic panels, made from 28 piles of Kevlar, offer even more anti-ballistic protection as they have been treated with Compound 18.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you thought Kevlar was good, it's even better when it has been treated with Compound 18. This vest's ballistic panels, made from 28 piles of Kevlar, offer even more protection as they have been treated with the liquid anti-ballistic solution.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This vest's ballistic panels, made from 28 piles of Kevlar, offer even better protection since they have been treated with Crepitus royal jelly.

This vest is made of Spectra Shield, an ultra high-performance ballistic sheet that dramatically reduces blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots. Its carrier pocket can hold an additional trauma plate.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The most advanced technology in body armor. This vest is made of Spectra Shield, an ultra high-performance ballistic sheet that dramatically reduces blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots. Its carrier pocket can hold an additional trauma plate.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Spectra Shield vest, made from an ultra high-performance ballistic sheet to reduce blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots, has been treated with Compound 18 to further improve its impenetrability.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Advanced body armor technology combined with chemistry produced this Spectra Shield vest. Made from high-performance ballistic sheets, it dramatically reduces blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots. Add on Compound-18 and you're virtually invincible.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Made from an ultra high-performance ballistic sheet that reduces blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots, this Spectra Shield vest offers even more protection with its coating of queen Crepitus jelly.
The ballistic panels on these leggings are made from 28 piles of protective Kevlar. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps were designed to maintain a snug fit.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The ballistic panels on these leggings are made from 28 piles of protective Kevlar. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps were designed to maintain a snug fit without reducing mobility. These should be standard fare in every mercenary's wardrobe.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The ballistic panels on these leggings, made from 28 piles of Kevlar, have been treated with Compound 18 for extra anti-ballistic protection.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Above standard body armor protection--the ballistic panels on these leggings are made from 28 piles of Kevlar, and have been treated with Compound 18 for extra anti-ballistic protection.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Made from 28 piles of Kevlar, these leggings have been smeared with jelly from the queen Crepitus for extra protection.
These Spectra Shield leggings reduces blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps won't restrain mobility.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These Spectra Shield leggings are the most body armor protection available on the market. They reduce blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots. Fully adjustable waist and ankle straps make for a snug fit without reduced mobility.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These Spectra Shield, Compound 18 treated, leggings offer even more protection against blunt trauma from multiple hits and angled shots, than standard Spectra leggings.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Take the most advanced body armor protection available and make it better--these Spectra Shield Compound 18 treated leggings offer even more protection against blunt trauma, from multiple hits and angled shots, than standard Spectra leggings.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These Spectra Shield leggings, made from an ultra high-performance ballistic material for reduced trauma from multiple hits and angled shots, have been coated in queen Crepitus jelly for superior protection.
This steel helmet provides protection from small firearms, shrapnel and other projectiles. It has a padded leather and nylon suspension, with an adjustable chin strap.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Comfortable and extremely practical. This steel helmet provides protection from small firearms, shrapnel and other projectiles. It has a padded leather and nylon suspension, with an adjustable chin strap.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Personal Armor System Ground Troops Helmet is made from Kevlar, with a comfortable suspension system, sweatband and chin strap. It also extends further over the ear and neck than standard helmets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For above average protection, the wise merc always wears the Personal Armor System Ground Troops Helmet. It's made from Kevlar, and has a comfortable suspension system, sweatband and chin strap. It also extends further over the ear and neck than average helmets.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Made from Kevlar, this Personal Armor System Ground Troops Helmet has been treated with Compound 18 to further enhance its defensive capabilities.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Made from Kevlar, for above average protection, This Personal Armor System Ground Troops Helmet has been treated with Compound 18 to further enhance its defensive purposes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Personal Armor System Ground Troops Kevlar Helmet has been covered with queen creature jelly to further protect your noggin.

This light Spectra composite helmet, known for its anti-ballistic qualities,has an IR-absorbing black finish, cushioning foam, and an adjustable harness system with a leather head band and rubber chin strap.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This helmet is made from a light Spectra composite that is famous for its superior anti-ballistic qualities. It features an IR-absorbing black finish, cushioning foam and an adjustable harness system with a leather headband and rubber chin strap.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Dipped in Compound 18, this light Spectra composite helmet offers the maximum available amount of anti-ballistic protection.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Dipped in Compound 18, this light Spectra composite helmet offers the maximum amount of anti-ballistic protection possible. Rumor has it that this type of helmet has made a world of difference for some mercs who actually make it back from the front line.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This light Spectra composite helmet that's covered in queen Crepitus jelly offers even more advanced anti-ballistic protection.
These hard ceramic plates can be inserted into the front and back of most vests to provide extra protection by dispersing the impact from most standard ammunition loads.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Any mercenary that wants to come out alive, never leaves home without a few of these plates. Made from a hard ceramic composite, they can be inserted into the breast plate of most vests to improve their impenetrability.

ITEM.szItemDesc: NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
A bomber-style leather aviation jacket.
This bomber-style leather aviation jacket has been lined with Kevlar to provide a minimal amount of protection. The dark colour makes it perfect for night operations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This bomber-style leather aviation jacket has been lined with Kevlar to provide a minimal amount of protection. The dark colour makes it perfect for night operations.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This bomber-style leather aviation jacket has been lined with Kevlar and treated with compound 18 for added protection.
This bomber-style leather aviation jacket has been lined with Kevlar and coated with queen Crepitus jelly to enhance its protectiveness.
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
No tourist could ever resist one of these trendy 'I love Arulco' t-shirts. Made from 100 per cent pre-shrunk cotton, it was a popular buy before the days of Deidranna.

Show your allegiance to the queen with style. Ever since she acquired power, sporting one of these 'Deidranna rules' t-shirts at government-sponsored events has become a common practice among Arulcans.
This high quality ballistic vest is manufactured from 36 piles of Kevlar by Guardian Armories, Inc. It is fully adjustable and has a pocket for a ceramic armour insert.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This high quality ballistic vest is manufactured from 36 piles of Kevlar by Guardian Armories, Inc. Also available in tuxedo style for those especially dangerous formal occasions.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This high quality ballistic vest, brought to you by Guardian Armories, has been improved through treatment with Compound 18.
This high quality Guardian Armories ballistic vest has been coated with jelly from the queen Crepitus and now provides amazing protection!
Compact 10x30 Binoculars of simple construction.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Compact, light-weight, and inexpensive binoculars. For outdoors use during the day.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 7x50 High-Quality Binoculars.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Rugged binoculars for the serious hunter or soldier. Multi-coated lenses, nitrogen-filled, and rubber-armored. Usable under bad light conditions.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit contains: antiseptic, cotton rolls, a thermometer, iodine and merthiolate vials, arm slings, safety pins, scissors, forceps, various bandages and a mini first aid manual.
ITEM.szBRDesc: From fractures to abrasions, this all-canvas kit-to-go includes everything you'll need to attend to most minor injuries. It includes: bandages, antiseptic, cotton balls, thermometers, iodine, arm slings, safety pins, scissors, and a mini first aid manual.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Aside from standard first aid supplies, this kit includes: a suture set and scissors, prep pads, a scalpel, Kelly forceps, tweezers, pain killers, anesthetic, antibiotics, a pen light, and a surgical manual.
ITEM.szBRDesc: It's a first aid kit and then some. Aside from standard first aid supplies, this kit includes: a suture set, prep pads, suture scissors, a scalpel, Kelly forceps, tweezers, anesthetic, pain killers, antibiotics, a pen light, and the "Emergency War Surgery" manual.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit includes: a wide range of screwdrivers, ratchets, pliers, clamps, clasps, a hammer and a sewing kit.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This kit offers every tool you'll need to repair most combat items. A wide range of screwdrivers, ratchets, pliers, clamps, and clasps are included, as well as a hammer and sewing kit.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This top-grain cowhide leather zipped case offers expert lockpicking tools including: picks, shims, tension wrenches, warded master keys, a broken key extractor, and a palm-key press.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The perfect solution for getting behind locked doors and into security safes. This kit offers expert lockpicking tools, including: picks, shims, tension wrenches, warded master keys, a broken key extractor, and a palm-key press, all in a top-grain cowhide leather zipped case.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Military Wood Camo Compact includes several green and brown nuanced facial paints, a mirror, and a manual on the proper use and care of your camo compact.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Military Wood Camo Compact includes several green and brown nuanced facial paints, and a mirror. This long-lasting, non-running, facial paint can be easily removed with soap and water. The kit also includes a manual that outlines the proper use and care of your compact.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This kit contains everything required to build traps including: trip-wire, explosives, and triggers.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Everything you need to build the most lethal trap for unsuspecting passers-by, is contained in this kit. From trip-wire to batteries, you'll be entertained for hours.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The light, compact design of this silencer can be fitted easily to most handguns and sub-machine guns.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the ideal silencer for both indoor and outdoor missions that have to be kept quiet. Its light and compact design can be fitted easily to most handguns and sub-machine guns.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A large scope, too big to fit on most assault rifles and carbines. Hmmm, maybe it would fit on a sniper rifle?
ITEM.szBRDesc: Dramatically improve your targeting accuracy with this extremely versatile sniper scope. You'll quickly appreciate this scope's accurate windage adjustment, range-finder precision scale, and coated optics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The universal bipod fits most sniper and assault rifles, as well as light machine guns. Made from a die-cast aluminum, it has a coated matte finish. Its legs fold up when not in use for easy storage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Every sensible mercenary packs one of these universal bipods. It fits most sniper and assault rifles, as well as light machine guns. Made from a die-cast aluminum, it has a coated matte finish. Its legs fold up when not in use, for easy storage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Bionic Ear Scout is a high fidelity stereo amplifier headset with dual wind-resistant microphones that amplify small sounds and filter out the very loud. Its fully adjustable head strap ensures a snug fit.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Bionic Ear Scout offers advanced warning of approaching intruders. This high fidelity stereo amplifier head set features dual wind-resistant micro-phones that amplify small sounds and filter out the very loud. Its fully adjustable head strap ensures a snug fit even when on the run.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The first generation of light amplification goggles. Picture is somewhat grainy and light amplification has just begun to be researched.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The first generation of nightvision gear, still available for those who cannot afford the luxury stuff.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These paramilitary eye protectors have triple-lenses: an anti-fog interior acetate lens, a tinted middle lens for reduced glare, and a scratch and shatter resistant exterior lens.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These paramilitary eye goggles feature triple-protection lenses: an interior anti-fog acetate lens, a tinted middle lens for reduced glare, and a scratch and shatter resistant exterior lens. And as an added bonus, they can be worn comfortably over prescription glasses.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Replicated from the Russian M-17A1, this rubber mask has cheek filters, scratch-proof lenses, adjustable head straps, and a drinking attachment. A vinyl shoulder bag and plastic poncho are also included.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Russian rubber mask is a copy of the American M-17A1. It has cheek filters, scratch-proof lenses, adjustable head straps, and a unique drinking attachment. It also comes with a vinyl shoulder bag, and plastic poncho to help protect you from blistering agents.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This polyethylene canteen is extremely practical. Whenever you encounter a fresh mountain spring, you can refill it again.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Any sensible mercenary would carry such a useful item with him. This water-filled polyetherene canteen is refillable and reusable so be sure to have one nearby.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is an extremely light and powerful transistorized metal detector with aural signalization. All the user has to do is have it on his person and an alarm sounds when metal is detected.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This hand-held metal detector is extremely powerful-it'll find more than just coins on the beach. It is a lightweight transistorized metal detector with aural signalization that is used most effectively by explosive detection operatives.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This quick-hardening liquid when administered to most body armor, claims to further advance the protective properties of standard anti-ballistic materials.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Slop on some of this stuff to feel truly invincible. This quick-hardening liquid claims to enhance the protective qualities of your standard Kevlar or Spectra Shield body armor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is a blob of royal jelly from the queen Crepitus.
A glass jar containing an elixir made from creature blood and Gabby's secret blend of eleven herbs and spices.
Cash, coin, moolah, dough. Whatever you call it, it'll buy you stuff.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Cash, coin, moolah, dough. Whatever you call it, it'll buy you stuff.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An empty glass jar is great for storing preserves, grandma's teeth, or anything else for that matter.
A glass jar containing what appears to be creature blood.
This hypodermic syringe is filled with a chemical stimulant that will temporarily boost your energy level. Caution: repeated use has been known to cause cardiac arrest.
This firing device features a timer that can be set anywhere between five seconds and ten minutes to allow you to move to a position of safety before its attached explosive goes off.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Attach this baby to an explosive for real power and control. This time-delayed detonator allows you anywhere from five seconds to ten minutes to move to a location of safety before its attached explosive goes off.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Place this time-delayed firing device onto any explosive to allow you to blow up a target from a position of safety. The detonator won't ignite until you use a separate remote trigger device.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A must have for any serious explosives agent. Place this time-delayed firing device to any explosive to blow up a target when you want, from where you want. The detonator won't ignite until you hit the remote trigger.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This VHS tape entitled, 'Pant Suit Loretta 6: The Men Are Away,' is an adult XXX film. Parental and viewer discretion is advised.
This is the deed to Angel's leather shop.
This is the letter Enrico gave you. Deliver it to Miguel, leader of the rebels.
This diskette is labelled, 'Intercept's Most Wanted.' It contains confidential information on known international terrorists. It has been copied onto the laptop computer for easy reference.
Goblet of goodness, tumbler of treasures, glass of gambles. This drinking cup is a national treasure around Arulco, so don't mock it.
Taken right out from under them, these razor-sharp bloodcat claws could bring you a pretty penny in the right market.
It takes a real man to rip these babies off. Bloodcat teeth are a rare and treasured commodity in some parts of the world.
Skinning a cat is no small feat. The price on this exotic fur won't be cheap.
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
This hypodermic syringe is filled with 10cc's of a fast-acting healing drug. The warning label reads: "Do not exceed more than 4 doses per day."
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
A glass jar containing what appears to be human blood. What kind of sicko stores human blood anyway???
If you can read this, JA2 programmers messed up! NO DESCRIPTION NECESSARY!
The Universal Laser projects a highly visible red spot at a rather significant range. In a stainless steel housing, it fits onto the trigger guard of most sub-machine guns and pistols.
ITEM.szBRDesc: You won't lose sight of your target when using one of these. The Universal Laser projects a highly visible red spot upt to 90m at night. In a stainless steel housing, it fits onto the trigger guard of most weapons.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Once the remote detonator has been placed onto an explosive, it won't ignite until you use this remote trigger device.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This small radio-control device has four preselect channels and is to be used to trigger Remote Detonators. Battery will last a lifetime.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Your average everyday handyman's wire cutters.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Your average everyday handyman's wire cutters. Extremely useful and versatile-don't leave home without them!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This metal object, when attached to the end of a shotgun barrel, causes buckshot fired from the shotgun to spread out along a horizontal line instead of its standard circular pattern.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Attach this metal object to the end of a shotgun barrel for a real deadly effect. It causes buckshot fired from the shotgun to spread out along a horizontal line instead of its standard circular pattern. Say good-bye to anyone who gets into its path.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Booze, spirits, swamp root, hooch. At 80 proof, drinking this stuff will definitely lead to intoxication.
Second generation nightvision gear has a better intensifier than earlier models. Picture is still somewhat grainy. This type is mostly available to the public.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Whether you are a hunter, outdoorsman, or LEO, with this one no prey can hide from you in darkness.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Having already delivered the hammer of justice upon its target, this empty LAW rocket launcher will live out the rest of its Dredd-ful existence as a glorified paper weight.
One unidentified, slightly decaying, human head.
The Imposter won't be imposing on anyone anymore. You're the proud owner of his slightly decaying head.
T-Rex may be gone like the dinosaurs, but be sure to hold on to his head for posterity.
Slay's been slain and all that remains is his decomposing head.
This Druggist won't be renewing any prescriptions. His head is on your chopping block now.
No one's gonna miss MOM, or her head. It's yours for the taking.
Tiffany Eddie may not have profited from using his head but you will, now that he's dead.
This bottle of Saw Mill Spring's finest red vino combines fermented grape juice with the flavor of wood pulp for a truly unique taste.
At 6.9 per cent alcohol, who the hell cares where this stuff came from? This ice beer will even put a Russian under the table.
Bustler magazine, July issue. Features an interesting pictorial by Demi Moon and various articles no one will ever read.
This VHS camera will record and play back all your favorite memories, including embarrassing wedding moments or local magistrates in compromising positions.
Send your robot out to do your dirty work with this trusty remote control. Let him do your bidding as you sit pretty from a point of safety.
A razor-sharp claw from one of those repugnant creatures that is thankfully dead.
A rotting chunk of putrified creature flesh. At least this one's dead now.
Dead creature innards, just in time for lunch!
This is device to control something from a distance. It only has one button on it, though.
Tell time in style with this designer watch featuring a quartz crystal, swiss movement and 4 microns of beautiful platinum plating.
This bag of woods and irons is a vintage set that has seen better days on the green. Although slightly beat up, you could still score under par with them.
Listen to your favorite tunes wherever you go with this portable cassette player and mini-headphones. They will make any long trek a little more merry.
You won't miss your favorite cartoon or lose track of the football scores with this portable television. Don't leave home without it!
This is how you access your main 'bank account' where you can get your hands on cash by clicking on the different amounts followed by 'Done'. Having cash in hand is sometimes very useful.
A solid box of robustos. Suitable to be clenched between your teeth in the heat of battle or for hanging around a cigar lounge with a fine glass of port.
INTERNAL ITEM
A small gold-coloured key which might fit a cabinet lock.
A prison key made of stainless steel.
A simple key. Looks like it would fit a pretty crummy lock.
A dull-coloured key.
A shiny key which probably fits a more than ordinary lock.
A padlock key.
An electronic key with a magnetic strip in place of metal teeth.
An electronic key card.
This magazine contains 20 rounds of 5.7mm ammunition. This polymer pistol round performs remarkably well against both armored and unarmored opponents.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 5.7mm somersaults through flesh and bone leaving major wound cavities.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 20 rounds of 5.7mm hollow point ammunition have enhanced injury inflicting capabilities over the basic 5.7 and have retained most of its armor piercing capabilities.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These 20 rounds of 5.7mm hollow point ammunition have enhanced injury inflicting capabilities over the basic 5.7 and have retained most of its armor piercing capabilities.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A black commando-type tuque.
ITEM.szBRDesc: On Sale: 1/2 Price! For a limited time only, you can purchase this fine Commando Tuque, made from the finest cotton, for 50 percent off!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the standard issue body armour of the US military. What were they thinking? This stuff wears out way too fast.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Stronger than kevlar, this is the body armour worn by US Marines in Iraq. Provides limited camouflage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the standard issue body armour of the US military. What were they thinking? This stuff wears out way too fast.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Stronger than kevlar, this is the body armour worn by US Marines in Iraq. Provides limited camouflage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Officer's fatigues. This is the standard issue body armour of the US military. What were they thinking? This stuff wears out way too fast.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Officer's fatigues. Stronger than kevlar, this is the body armour worn by US Marines in Iraq. Provides limited camouflage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A nice hat to wear when your helmet gets too hot. Provides limited camouflage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: As seen on TV! This is the same hat that "Wild Bill" wore on the GI Joe Saturday morning cartoon. Ok, so it's not the same hat. But's its still a nice hat.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you ever need to go to a formal dinner party while you're here in Arulco, you could wear this. Or not.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Formal attire of the US Marine Corps. Warning! This is not a viable combat vestement.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is an officer's hat. From the looks of it, it's probably from the US.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A marine officer's hat. Comes with free beer-hat.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is a military issue red beret as used by many countries to denote a member of the special forces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Start your own special forces team!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Wow, nice hat!
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Soviet guard's hat. Available in brown and red.

ITEM.szItemDesc: For those cold Russian winters, you need the best in head warming fur hats. So why would you need it in Arulco?
ITEM.szBRDesc: For those cold Russian winters, you need the best in head warming fur hats. Comes with free ear muffs.

ITEM.szItemDesc: While this coat looks like it'll hold up fine against the rain, it doesn't look like it'll do much against bullets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Soviet officer's coat. Available with and without pocket lint.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is an officer's hat. From the looks of it, it's probably from the former Soviet Union.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Soviet officer's hat. Available with and without lice.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This helmet comes with eye protection, and feels very sturdy. The dark colour makes it perfect for night operations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard issue SWAT armour. Strong, resilient and flexible. An excellent choice for situations which require light armour and high mobility. The dark colour makes it perfect for night operations.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Standard issue SWAT armoured leggings. Sturdier than standard kevlar due to extra integrated plating, but still provide excellent mobility. The dark colour makes it perfect for night operations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard issue SWAT armour. Strong, resilient and flexible. An excellent choice for situations which require light armour and high mobility. The dark colour makes it perfect for night operations.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Standard issue SWAT armoured vest. Sturdier than standard kevlar due to extra integrated plating, but still provides excellent mobility. The dark colour makes it perfect for night operations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard issue SWAT armour. Strong, resilient and flexible. An excellent choice for situations which require light armour and high mobility. The dark colour makes it perfect for night operations.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Oh Yeah? Well, same to you buddy!
Standard issue for security guards in many countries, this retractable baton is greating for whipping out and beating.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard retractable baton. Popular with security guards.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Long, hard and good for a serious beating.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Go Rodney-King on someone's ass with this police nightstick.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pry open locks and stab your enemies with this all purpose utility knife.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Pry open locks and stab your enemies with this all purpose utility knife.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A small, well-balanced knife.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A small, well-balanced blade that does a little less damage that our standard combat knife, but can be swung a bit faster.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Exactly what you'd need if you were going to cut through some cardboard. Pretty much useless in combat though.
This steel helmet provides protection from small firearms, shrapnel and other projectiles. It has been painted with camouflage.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Comfortable and extremely practical. This steel helmet provides protection from small firearms, shrapnel and other projectiles. It has a padded leather and nylon suspension, with an adjustable chin strap. Provides limited camouflage.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This rather tarnished silver platter bears no inscription. It looks as though it may have been a thoughtful gift at one time.
This roll of gray, 2-inch wide heavy-duty tape is great for patching holes and keeping things together. Use utility knife to cut off small pieces.
This aluminum curtain rod is broken at both ends. Wonder what happened to the curtains.
This small, heavy-duty, metal coil spring is common to many household appliances.
Install this smart, well-crafted spring and bolt replacement in a firearm to boost its rate of fire!
A basic raw piece of steel, looking for a home.
Once this glue gets a grip, it doesn't let go. It will permanently stick to most substances in less than 3 minutes.
Attach this nifty chunk of hardware to any gun barrel and watch your range soar.
A 19-foot piece of typical white string.
This old soda can looks as though it's been kicking around for quite some time.
A piece of string attached to a soda can makes a great noise-maker when tied to a car bumper at a wedding party procession.
These round, shiny, colorful, and surprisingly heavy balls of glass are usually found in young boys' pockets. They are used mostly for amusement.
A Liquid Crystal Display ripped out of a small, portable, grayscale game machine.
Your everyday copper wire, great for electronics.
This contraption is essentially a LameBoy LCD rigged with copper wiring.
This Kid-tendo Fumble Pak device vibrates a video game joystick during gameplay. Warning: it may cause the player to lose his grip.
This is a piece of a hospital x-ray machine.
A pack of sugurless, spearmint flavored chewing gum. Dentists recommend chewing after every meal and between brushings.
This is a nifty looking, but sticky device made from various parts. It looks like it could light up and vibrate.
NeverReady double 'A' batteries. This may sound like a description of some woman you know, and just like a woman, these batteries will likely conk out on you, just when you need them the most.
Elasticity at its best. This rather old invention is still great for keeping a few things together.
This homemade x-ray device looks like it will actually function, flashing a vibrating x-ray pulse and crudely displaying the results on its LCD. Batteries required.
A nugget of pure silver, probably right out of Arulco's silver mines.
Just like cash, only heavier. This is a shiny, impressive nugget of pure gold, compliments of Arulco's rather meager mineral mines.
Use this tank of gas wisely. They are extremely hard to come by, here in Arulco.
Call it 5.56 or .223, it still puts neat holes and ugly wound channels in the opposition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Call it 5.56 or .223, it still puts neat holes and ugly wound channels in the opposition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Banned for military use by conventions and agreements. (We won't tell them if you won't.)
ITEM.szBRDesc: Banned for military use by conventions and agreements. (We won't tell them if you won't.)

ITEM.szItemDesc: The name says it all, it's an Uzi. First there was the Mini-Uzi, now the Micro-Uzi. One can only wonder when the Pocket-Uzi will roll-off the Israeli assembly line.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The name says it all, it's an Uzi. First there was the Mini-Uzi, now the Micro-Uzi. One can only wonder when the Pocket-Uzi will roll-off the Israeli assembly line.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This British weapon was actually made in Nottingham, not Enfield, where computer controlled tools were finally able to eliminate all of its serious defects.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This British weapon was actually made in Nottingham, not Enfield, where computer controlled tools were finally able to eliminate all of its serious defects.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This new Israeli high-tech machine gun will bullpup your socks off. Weighing only 5.5 pounds empty, this weapon of death can fire off 900 5.56mm bullets a minute.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This new Israeli high-tech machine gun will bullpup your socks off. Weighing only 5.5 pounds empty, this weapon of death can fire off 900 5.56mm bullets a minute.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This silent sniper rifle from Russia fires heavy 9mm bullets at subsonic speeds and apparently can pierce all types of body armor at over 400 meters. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This silent sniper rifle from Russia fires heavy 9mm bullets at subsonic speeds and apparently can pierce all types of body armor at over 400 meters.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This German made weapon exemplifies the country's reputation for precision and is a sniper's weapon of choice.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This German made weapon exemplifies the country's reputation for precision and is a sniper's weapon of choice.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This modified M82A2's bullpup layout places the action and barrel further back in the stock, retaining its barrel length while shortening its overall size.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This modified M82A2's bullpup layout places the action and barrel further back in the stock, retaining its barrel length while shortening its overall size.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A runner-up in the US Military's bid to replace the venerable Colt 1911, this compact and reliable handgun is still a favorite among armed forces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reliability and ease of use are key features of this swiss made handgun. Comes with a short Picatinny rail in front of the triggerguard.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Five-seveN pistol was designed as a complimentary sidearm for the P90 submachine-gun. The Five-seveN is a delayed blowback operated, semi-automatic firearm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Five-seveN pistol was designed as a complimentary sidearm for the P90 submachine-gun. The Five-seveN is a delayed blowback operated, semi-automatic firearm. It features a polymer frame with underbarrel acessory rail.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The PYa (Pistolet Yarygina - codenamed Grach) was developed for the Russian Army in the early 1990s, in particular for firing 7N21 rounds. A conservative, but well balanced and sturdy weapon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The PYa (Pistolet Yarygina - codenamed Grach) was developed for the Russian Army in the early 1990s, in particular for firing 7N21 rounds. A conservative, but well balanced and sturdy pistol, with adequate accuracy and decent firepower.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MP-446 Viking is a sporting derivative of the MP-443 Grach pistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MP-446 Viking is a sporting derivative of the MP-443 Grach pistol. It's similar in design, but its frame is made from advanced composites to reduce wear and tear.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A wall of buckshot as fast as you can pull the trigger, ideal for home defense and tense family gatherings. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Modeled after the AK-47, the Saiga is a well designed and affordable semi-automatic shotgun with a host of personal defense and tactical applications.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Depending on what ammo you need to fire, the Benelli M3 convertible Shotgun can switch immediately from pump-action to semi-auto or vice-versa.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M3's ability to switch firing modes is an engineering marvel well worth the expense.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MP-5A4, basically, is no more than the scaled-down version of the Heckler-Koch G3 battle rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MP-5A4, basically, is no more than the scaled-down version of the Heckler-Koch G3 battle rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MP-5N was orignally developed for US Navy SEALs and features an integral flashlight.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Modern version of the MP-5 developed for US Navy SEALs. Comes with an integral flashlight and the barrel is threaded to accept US-made detachable silencers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A silenced version of the H&K MP-5 with integral silencer and fixed stock of A4 version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A silenced version of the H&K MP-5 with integral silencer and fixed stock of A4 version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The most well-known SMG in the world, and not without good reason.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Since its introduction in 1948, the Uzi has supplanted the Thompson as the household word in SMG's.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Built off of the M16A2, this SMG has been employed by the USMC, DEA and other military and law enforcement agencies.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This light, manageably sized SMG cranks out 9mm rounds at 900 RPM.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Often copied, but never truly duplicated, Mikhail Kalashnikov's gift to the world has kept on giving for more than half a century of armed conflict. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Universally known and respected amongst assault rifles. Get yours today!

ITEM.szItemDesc: The civilian brother of the G36, this sporting rifle features a heavier, more accurate barrel, and a lightened trigger pull.
ITEM.szBRDesc: With its rifle-style grip and rail system, some call this the ugly cousin of the G36. We still think its beautiful, and so will you after unloading a few rounds into your target of choice. Pick up this popular sporting rifle now at our exclusive low price!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Folding stock assault carbine in use with Russian security and counter-terror forces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The modernized version of the Vikhr SR-3 puts forward a folding foregrip, 30-round magazine and a new sound suppressor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In addition to seeing service world-wide, the SG540 has been a prototype for the development of several other firearms.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Built on an AK-style platform, this assault rifle has gone on to father little variants of its own.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Glaser ammunition has double the impact of standard hollow point ammo. Unfortunately, it also has twice as much difficulty penetrating armor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Six rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 9mm Parabellum, 9mm Luger, 9x19mm, or whatever you call it: it's the most common pistol caliber in the world.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 9mm Parabellum, 9mm Luger, 9x19mm, or whatever you call it: it's the most common pistol caliber in the world.

ITEM.szItemDesc: These 9mm hollow points provide more expansion and stopping power than regular ball ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These 9mm hollow points provide more expansion and stopping power than regular ball ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Punch holes in armored targets with impunity with these armor piercing bullets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Punch holes in armored targets with impunity with these armor piercing bullets.

ITEM.szItemDesc: AET ammo has expansion and armor piercing capabilities for double the punch, but can make your weapon somewhat unreliable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Your enemies hide behind Kevlar and ceramics? Your FMJ bullets punch through without being noticed? Here's the solution, the Advanced Energy Transfer ammo

ITEM.szBRDesc: Eight rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Tracer ammunition in 9mm. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Keeping track of ranging and shot placement has never been as fun or cost effective.

ITEM.szItemDesc: High quality ball ammunition to boost weapon range and performance.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Better range more than makes up for the increased cost of match grade ammo.

ITEM.szBRDesc: AET rounds to make your old Tokarev pistol a competitor to today's handguns.

ITEM.szBRDesc: New for the 7.62x25mm caliber: We now have AET rounds available, so you can take advantage of this technology if you are using Russian made SMGs.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The pinnacle of terminal ballistics combines armor defeating capability with the punch of a hollow point bullet in one small deadly package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The punch of a hollow point, with the penetration of an full metal jacketed round make this the ultimate CQB ammo for your 9mm subgun.

ITEM.szBRDesc: Bizon mags filled with AET ammo. Not that we believe that you really need that many rounds if using this type of ammo, but you may love the lack of a need to reload during combat.

ITEM.szBRDesc: Ideal for recon by fire or use as an improptu signal flare.

ITEM.szBRDesc: Match grade ammo will truly help you "go the distance."

ITEM.szItemDesc: The bullets in this magazine have been specially "cold-loaded" to reduce muzzle noise at a moderate cost to stopping power.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If 8 rounds of Glaser Safety ammo fail to make your point, the conversation wasn't worth having to begin with.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Eight rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Introduced in 1979 under the design of Jeff Cooper, 10mm ammo shares the dimensions, but not the popularity, of .40 S&W.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Developed for its stopping power, 10mm is not an uncommon ordninance for police and counter-terrorist agents.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of 10mm hollow point puts enemies out of the fight permanently.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 10mm HP is perfect for detering persistent foes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of armor piercing ammo in 10mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Targets in armor are no match for an AP round in their 10 ring.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The pinnacle of terminal ballistics combines armor defeating capability with the punch of a hollow point bullet in one small deadly package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 10mm AET doesn't brake for armor or tough organic matter. Burn down the burliest opponent regardless of ballistic armor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If 30 rounds of Glaser Safety ammo fail to make your point, the conversation wasn't worth having to begin with.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Thirty rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of match quality 10mm add to the range of your 10mm SMG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Increased range and performance are features of this hard hitting round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 30rnd magazine for the SR-2M Veresk machinepistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Now available: 30rnd mags vor the Veresk!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This five-shot speedloader of 12.5x35mm rounds is for the massive U-94S UDAR Revolver.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Owing its dimensions to the 32 gauge shotgun shell, the 12.5mm is a weighty round for a weighty handgun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 9x21mm was specially designed to punch through body armor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: According to its press, 9x21mm's tungsten core enables it to penetrate armored targets from 100 meters away.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This subsonic ammo is designed especially for silenced sniper rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Designed so snipers punch through helmets, not the sound barrier.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Deal out armor penetration and radiation damage from a suppressed rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Deliver a tactical nuclear strike on the smallest possible scale from your silenced sniper rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 5.45x18mm clip fits the diminutive PSM pistol.
5.45x18mm hollow point magazine for the PSM.
ITEM.szBRDesc: HP bullets augment the stopping power of this small-bore cartridge.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Dispensing with mechanical loading and firing, Metal Storm's stacked electronically fired ammunition promises reliable mass firepower at low weight. This bundle is configured for 72 rounds across 6 barrels, in 9mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Dispensing with mechanical loading and firing, Metal Storm's stacked electronically fired ammunition promises reliable mass firepower at low weight. This bundle is configured for 72 rounds across 6 barrels, in 9mm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Two 12 gauge slugs for your 12 gauge slug-gun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Deer hunting or man-hunting, a pair of shotgun slugs will put the quarry down.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Chamber these 12ga buckshot shells and proclaim with impunity: "This is my boomstick!"
ITEM.szBRDesc: Open up with a shower of buckshot and attackers will dissolve before your eyes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you're going to use a overpriced, impractical and unreliable handgun instead of a perfectly good rifle, you'll need ammunition for it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Magazine size, accuracy and controlability are a fair trade off for stopping power and coolness, right? Because if you're going to use a overpriced, impractical and unreliable handgun instead of a perfectly good rifle, you'll need ammunition for it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 40-round magazine contains 4.6mm ammunition for the HK MP-7. This round possesses wound and range capabilites comparable to a rifle round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Specialized ammunition uniquely used by the HK MP-7. Each bullet is about as large as a rifle round, and packs around the same punch.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Tracer ammunition in 5.45mm caliber. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: "Walking" burst fire onto a target has never been so easy with this 30-round magazine of 5.45mm ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 10 rounds of tracer ammunition in 7.62x39mm. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ranging and shot placement (and detection) are even easier with 10 rounds of 7.62x39mm tracer.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of tracer ammunition in 7.62x39mm. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Have your own private light show (without the aid of psychadelic drugs)when you put 30 rounds of 7.62x39mm tracer in the air.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Tracer ammunition in 5.45mm caliber. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Light up the night (or day) with a whopping 45-round mag of 5.45mm tracer ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Ranging and shot placement are easy with 10 rounds of 7.62 Russian tracer. Tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and full-auto modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ranging and shot placement are easy with 10 rounds of 7.62 Russian tracer. Tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and full-auto modes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This drum contains 75 rounds of 7.62 Warsaw Pact hollow point ammo. Although use of this round against light armored opponents can sway a battle in your favor, it's less effective against heavy armor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When killing them is simply not enough. A huge 75-round drum of 7.62mm Hollow Point is a great way to send the point home in true brain splattering style.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 7-round JSP clip for the .50 Beowulf Rifle
ITEM.szBRDesc: 7 rounds of the highpowered .50 Beowulf jacketed soft point ammo, just the thing for stopping vehicles.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 7-round HP clip for the .50 Beowulf Rifle
ITEM.szBRDesc: A clip of 7 Hollow Point rounds, perfect for harassing big pussycats.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 4 jacketed soft point rounds in a custom-produced mag.
4 HP rounds in a custom-produced mag.
There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.
ITEM.szBRDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.
ITEM.szBRDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.
ITEM.szBRDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.
ITEM.szBRDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.
ITEM.szBRDesc: There's no better way to tear the opposition to shreds than to tear through their armor with tiny pieces of flying metal.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This five-shot speedloader of 12.5x35mm armor piercing flechette rounds is for the massive U-94S UDAR Revolver.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Open up with a shower of armour piercing metal shards and your opponents will be cut down to size.. Literally.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This speed loader holds 6 rounds of .357 Magnum AET ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Penetrate enemy armor without fear of overpenetration with these french made AET rounds..

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 9 rounds of .357 Magnum AET ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Even if the enemy's armor stops all else, it won't stop these!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 6 rounds of .45 Winchester Magnum ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard ammo for some of the big-bore pistols.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 6 rounds of .45 WinMag Hollow Point ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you're a hunter, then you'll need this for your sidearm if your prey is not as dead as you believed on first sight...

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 6 rounds of .45 WinMag Armor Piercing ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Armor piercing ammo for the Wildey pistol and other .45 WinMag pistols.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This speed loader holds 5 rounds of .454 Casull ammunition, right for your handcannon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: .454 Casull is a round developed for some truly large revolvers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 5 rounds of .454 Casull Hollow Point ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: .454 Casull Hollow Point ammunition, if you use your revolver for hunting.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 5 rounds of .454 Casull Full Metal Jacket ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: .454 Casull Steel Jackets meet any need for self-defense ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is a single round of .454 Casull ammunition, usable for an oversized target-pistol.
1 round of .454 Casull Hollow Point ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: .454 Casull Hollow Point ammunition, for hunting game large enough not to be splattered by it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 1 round of .454 Casull Ball ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A .454 Casull Ball Cartridge, if you want to shock the rangemaster at your next silhouette-training.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 50-round Drum of .45 ACP ammo for the old Thompson M1928.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Original Thompson M1928 Drum, loaded with standard rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 50 rounds of hollowpoint ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This drum of hollowpoint ammunition is suitable to saw through a tree, or anything else that stands in your way.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 50 rounds of AP ammo in a springloaded drum.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Armor piercing ammo for serious homedefense. Whoever attacks you will run out of ammo before you do!

ITEM.szItemDesc: A drum filled with the highly effective AET ammo. Just check your gun carefully after firing this whole drum...
50 rounds of frangible Glaser ammunition will shred any soft target into tiny little pieces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 50 rounds of frangible Glaser ammunition will shred any soft target into tiny little pieces.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Though it seems to be a waste, someone filled this drum with Match ammo...
The already strong .50 AE is even more effective against unarmored targets with these hollowpoint bullets.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Hollowpoint bullets for your .50 AE handcannon. Probably better used for target-practice, if you shoot anything living with these, there will not be much left of it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 10-round magazine of 7.62x39mm Match ammunition for precision shooting.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Scarce and hard to come by, this Match ammo will change your SKS into a Designated Marksman rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 30 rounds of Match-grade ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Bullets shaped for less air-drag and newly formulated powder make for a straightened ballistic curve and effect greater range.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Someone took an empty ammo drum and filled it with Match ammo.
A pistol magazine holding 8 rounds of 10mm ammunition
ITEM.szBRDesc: Preferred by the FBI, 10mm Auto ammunition in magazines of 8 rounds each.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A pistol magazine holding 8 rounds of 10mm hollowpoints.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Hollowpoint ammunition in 10mm Auto, for serious self-defense.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A pistol magazine holding 8 rounds of 10mm AP ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 10mm Auto armor piercing ammo, for law enforcement and military use.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A pistol magazine holding 8 rounds of 10mm AET ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If full metal jacketed rounds are not good enough, AET will do.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A pistol magazine holding 8 rounds of 10mm Glaser frangible ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Glaser ammo in the much underestimated 10mm Auto caliber.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A pistol magazine holding 8 rounds of 10mm match ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 10mm Auto match ammunition is intended for the serious gun enthusiast.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A large sound suppressor that can be fitted to some sniper rifles.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A very large sound suppressor that can be fitted to some sniper rifles. Suppression of highpowered rounds comes at the price of high weight, though.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Shorter than a machete, but larger than most military knives.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The KaBar Cutlass is easier to handle than a machete, and looks more like the Nepalese Kukri, favored weapon of the famous Gurkha warriors.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This knife has a hole in the blade that works in conjunction with the end of the sheath to facilitate wirecutting.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a knife-version of Eickhorns KCB 77 M1 bayonet with wirecutting ability.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Top of the line, this knife is corrosion resistant and keeps an edge forever.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Pearl Harbor seems to have been forgotten even by the toughest soldiers there are, as this knife for the U.S. Navy Seals is made in Japan.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This heavy steel throwing knife brings new meaning to the expression killing them softly. Or, in this case, silently.
ITEM.szBRDesc: For experienced knife-throwers only! This heavy blade is guaranteed to punch even the heaviest of armor, but its weight makes it a little awkward for newbies.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A heavy throwing knife with a double-edged, chrome-plated, high carbon steel blade that is covered in blood.
A poor man's substitute for a decent knife. Looks like nobody bothered to wash it after eating with it either.
Now that's a knife!
A great big knife that looks like it came straight out of a Rambo movie. This thing looks big enough to use as a makeshift crowbar.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A great big knife that looks like it came straight out of a Rambo movie. Comes with "Entrail-Away" cleaning fluid.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 9x18mm Makarov SMG in use with Russian special forces and police.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Compact and solid SMG has an extending stock for faster draw time.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A relatively recent Russian manufactured AK variant. This model fires 5.45mm rounds. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reckoned to be 15-20% more accurate than the AK-74 by some shooters. Discerning mercenaries should give this assault rifle a try. This model fires 5.45mm rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A relatively recent Russian manufactured AK variant. This model fires 7.62mm WP rounds. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reckoned to be 15-20% more accurate than the AK-74 by some shooters. Give this new assault rifle a try. This model fires 7.62mm WP rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Agram 2000 has high marks and styling that make it popular not only with Eastern Block police forces, but their mafia counterparts as well.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 9mm submachine gun is one of the sportiest we have to offer!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Fresh from testing, Australia's Advanced Infantry Combat Weapon, is the lightest assault rifle/multi-shot grenade launcher concept out there.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Aussies have solved the weight and bulk problems associated with merging an assault rifle caliber firearm with a multi-shot grenade launcher. While the hi-tech Metal Storm based launcher is compact, it still fires a big 40mm round. The AUG carbine is no compromise either.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An AK-clone; this carbine was designed for export to other nations. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: While not as compact as the AKS-74U, this carbine's marginally longer barrel offers better performance. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: More powerful than its predecessor AK-74, this rifle employs many of today's new technologies. Long live the AK-47! Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Back to the future... The return of the 7.62mm cartridges. More powerful than its predecessor AK-74, this rifle employs many of today's new technologies. Long live the AK-47! Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: From the AK-100 line of clones, the AK-104 carbine is chambered for 7.62 WP. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Exported from Izhevsk straight to the regional/sectarian conflict of your choice. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AK-100 variant fires the 5.45x39mm cartridge. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The world just could not do without another Avtomat-Kalashnikova carbine, this time in 5.45mm. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: One of the new Alexandrov-Kalashnikovs on the market, this AR is lean, mean, reliable, and accurate. What more do you want, really? Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This addition to the new Alexandrov-Kalashnikov family features an impressive rate of fire, sliding tangent rear sights with a U notch, and a fearsome black phosphate finish. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 5.56x45 has finally invaded Russia. Like the Beatles in 1962, it's new, but it's popular. The AK-108 is a NATO standard Alexandrov-Kalashnikov . Go figure. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Who says Russians can't use NATO ammunition? Not the Russians! The AK-108 is built for the 5.56mm round, and performs admirably with it's new partner. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Variant of the standard AKM. While making the gun more maneuverable, the folding wire stock is not as stable or comfortable as standard wooden furniture. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This version of the AKM comes with a spiffy folding stock. About as comfortable to put against your shoulder as a lawnmower blade, it's compact size still makes it ideal for paratroopers, mechanized infantry, and anyone wearing a trenchcoat.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Originally developed for use by APC crews, this AK-47 variant sports a downward folding stock for when swinging space is at a premium. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Designed for portability and versatility with BMP APC's in mind, this AK is the Russian equivalent to a walkman: trendy for its time, practical, and a cause of hearing loss.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Successor to the AKS-47, this select fire rifle is chambered for 5.45mm rounds and is known for its noise and large muzzle flash. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If the AKS-47 was a Walkman, this baby is an iPod. The modernized 5.45mm version of the rereleased classic comes in just as many colors as its MP3 companion, but is decidedly harder to dance with. That is, of course, unless you're an Islamic Fundamentalist.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AK copy is not the most stable firing platform, but the forward grip gives you some extra control when it's time to rock and roll. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Despite being devoid of the trademark wood, this gun begs the question: "Does the world really need another Kalashnikov knockoff?" Our answer is an emphatic "Yes".

ITEM.szItemDesc: The new AN-94 Abakan design enables the gun to "pulse", firing a very fast two bullet burst before the recoil affects the user. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This weapon was designed by Gennadiy Nikonov. Another leap forward in gun making, you can be sure to see it soon on a hijacked airliner near you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Val assault rifle's integral supressor enables the user to hose down a room full of enemies in utter and deadly silence. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The tactical applications of a silenced assault weapon are limited only by the imagination (and moral inclinations) of the user.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This rifle will give you delusions of divinity on the battlefield. If you're looking for a sniper system that redefines the term "HEADSHOT!", then look no further.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Designed for extreme range in Arctic environments, the AWM is the last word in any long range engagement - and we do mean any. Firing the incredibly powerful .338 Lapua, this rifle's remarkable performance is rivaled only by it's remarkable pricetag.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In use with Russian elite law-enforcement units, this SMG fires the same armor-piercing round as the Gyurza pistol. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This SMG is small and light enough for easy carrying, yet fires the powerful 9x21mm round. 30rnd mags available now!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Firing .338 Lapua rounds, this highly accurate rifle is a rare commodity indeed.
ITEM.szBRDesc: With a completely uncovered barrel that is free to vibrate in any way it likes, you'll be sending "good" vibrations downrange and on target every time.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M4 is a high quality, very versatile shotgun, and is very popular as a police weapon, and as a civilian weapon for self defense.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M4 uses an inertia recoil semi-automatic system which allows to the shooter to lock the semi-automatic action and switch to the manually operated pump-action mode and back in the matter of seconds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Beretta 92FS is a slightly modified version of the Beretta 92F used by the US military.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Beretta 92FS is a slightly modified version of the Beretta 92F used by the US military. It features a chrome lined barrel, new grip panels and a lanyard ring.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A modified version of the Beretta 92, rechambered for the .40 S&W caliber.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A modified version of the Beretta 92, rechambered for the .40 S&W caliber. Features a redesigned slide, and removable front sight blade.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Italian designed and manufactured assault rifle, the AR-70/90 can be a platform for a dazzling array of attachments.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Yet another Kalashnikov-inspired weapon, this 5.56mm assault rifle has a quality all its own.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A solid Italian sniper rifle from the 80's, this gun has aged like a fine wine. Just pull the trigger and say "Ciao."
ITEM.szBRDesc: An Italian military exclusive, cousin Lester had to do a few favors so we could carry this exquisite piece of sniping hardware. Order now and we'll throw in some photos of Lester's trip. (Warning: Photos contain adult content. Must be 21 or older)

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Bizon SMG is chambered to accept 7.62 Tokarev box magazines. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Variety is the spice of life, try out the SMG in its 7.62 Tk variant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Simple and reliable (if heavy) the A6's firepower was favored by American paratroopers during WW2. The barrel is not quick-detachable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An oldie but goodie with a high rate of fire, this classic belt-fed LMG will answer all your offensive and defensive needs. The barrel is not quick-detachable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Swedish SMG and its variants have been in service with the Swedish military since 1937.
ITEM.szBRDesc: No stranger to armed conflict, make this rugged 9mm SMG yours today.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Modelo C is a dependable 7.62mm NATO Spanish Assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The H&K line of rifles got their design and license from the CETME model, which speaks volumes about its performance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Made by the Knight's Armament Company, the KAC SR-25M can be considered a match version of the AR10 rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Made by the Knight's Armament Company, the KAC SR-25M can be considered a match version of the AR10 rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A popular M1911A1 variant designed to use double-stacked magazines.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A popular M1911A1 variant designed to use double-stacked magazines, with up to 14 rounds of .45 caliber power.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The latest in the M16 series, the M16A4 features "flat top" receivers and Picatinny rails for increased accessory compatibility.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The latest model M16 assault rifle has everything the A2 had and more. With the built-in Picatinny rail system, it can be outfitted with all the accessories you ever wanted.

ITEM.szItemDesc: As the mini version of the M16, this weapon is small but deadly. Used by many armed forces and law enforcement organizations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Small, light and deadly, the M4A1 is extremely effective in close quarter battles. If you like the M16, you'll love the M4.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Following a long tradition of high qualiy yet affordable hunting rifles, this piece is designed specifically for human hunting.
ITEM.szBRDesc: With this high-quality yet affordable bolt-action sniper rifle it is hard to miss your target.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A Czech handgun for the famous 7.62TT round. Adopted in 1952, the CZ-52 is a powerful and accurate handgun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Czech handgun for the famous 7.62TT round. Adopted in 1952, the CZ-52 is a powerful and accurate handgun. This weapon has been retired from general military use.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An aesthetically attractive, comfortable to handle, accurate and reliable sidearm made in the Czech Republic.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Czech-made full-size semiautomatic pistol first appeared in 1975, intended for the export market. An aesthetically attractive, comfortable to handle, accurate and reliable sidearm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A variant of the .357 Magnum Desert Eagle that packs the extra punch of a .44 caliber round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A variant of the .357 Magnum Desert Eagle that packs the extra punch of a .44 caliber round. Often used as protection from large animals and tourists.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In 1991, the Desert Eagle earned overnight notoriety when this .50 AE variant was revealed.
ITEM.szBRDesc: In 1991, the Desert Eagle earned overnight notoriety when this .50 AE variant was revealed. Massive firepower in a massive pistol.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Used by only the most elite counter-terror units, the DSR-1 is the future of pinpoint accuracy. This gun can shoot 5mm groups at 100 yards.
ITEM.szBRDesc: With a free floating barrel, muzzle brake, aluminum hand guards, and a bitchin' futuristic design, it's one of the coolest damn things we've ever seen. Oh, and did we mention that it sports accuracy once thought impossible to attain with conventional firearms?

ITEM.szItemDesc: Just about as accurate (and expensive) as you can make a gun, the SR-100 can shoot groupings other rifles can only dream of.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Comes with muzzle brake, forged barrel, 3-lug bolt action and adjustable match trigger. If you're planning on competing in the Olympics in-between assignments, this gun's for you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: 9mm Machine pistol designed for security forces and support troops.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Chilean made clone of Heckler and Koch's MP5K.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Swiss designed, Chilean manufactured 9mm SMG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Strongly influenced by the Sig 540, the SAF adds to the ranks of quality Subguns.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This model of the SAF includes an integral silencer.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This silenced SMG is just the thing for your next covert operation.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Originally designed in 1925, the High Power didn't see military service until 1935, and was the only sidearm that served for both sides in WW2. This one is chambered in .40S&W.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Originally designed in 1925, the High Power didn't see military service until 1935. The latest incarnation, the HP-35, is in use today in the Belgian Military. This one is chambered in .40S&W.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FN BDA 9 is the double-action version of the tried and true Browning High Power semiautomatic pistol.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The FN BDA 9 is the double-action version of the tried and true Browning High Power semiautomatic pistol.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This futuristic and fearsome looking rifle is Fabrique Nationale's latest entry into Law Enforcement weaponry.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The F2000 is a gas operated, rotating bolt, select-fire weapon. It features polymer stock with bull-pup layout. It comes standard with a 40mm grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A smaller, more versatile version of the widely used Fusil Automatique Leger, this carbine still packs a mighty punch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The original "Right Arm Of The Free World", without the weight. Grab this 7.62mm spewing baby if you like your extreme prejudice on a diet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A heavily modified FAL, its compact size, portability, light weight, and power combine to make this a formidable battle rifle. Comes with an integral flashlight.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The FAL OSW is extremely versatile. Featuring picatinny rails and a folding stock, this carbine is for someone who means business.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FN MAG was developed in the early 50s, and is still widely used today. It is very reliable and will work even in the worst conditions.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nail your enemies to the walls with the FN MAG. With a fire rate of 950 rounds per minute, you can draw a deadly line of fire everywhere you need it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FN Minimi SPW (Special Purpose Weapon) is a lighter version of the standard Minimi, with Para type buttstock and rail adapters.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Special Forces version of the Minmi is smaller, lighter and easier to use, but can still kick major ass in every situation.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The SCAR is FN's newest offering into the military armament scene. The "H" stands for "Heavy", and refers to this version firing the 7.62mm NATO round. CQC denotes the shortest version for fighting in dense terrain.
ITEM.szBRDesc: US SOCOM issued a solicitation for the procurement of SOF Combat Assault Rifles (SCAR) in 2003, and this is what FN came up with. Widely customizable and extremely durable; if ever a gun had promise, the SCAR does.

ITEM.szItemDesc: FN's latest addition to the SCAR family is the "L" or Light version, chambered in 5.56mm NATO. The CQC version is for MOUT or dense terrain.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The FN SCAR was designed to be more customizable than any other weapon, period. Experts agree: it's nearly perfect. This version is chambered for the lighter 5.56mm NATO round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A red headed bastard step child of the Eastern AK-47 and the Western M-16, this Belgian beauty has an integral flash suppressor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A red headed bastard step child of the Eastern AK-47 and the Western M-16, this Belgian beauty has an integral flash suppressor and a Swedish twin. In the words of Gershwin, who could ask for anything more... besides a lighter trigger pull.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This ambitious sniper rifle fires 7.62mm NATO rounds very accurately due to its bolt action and thermal shielded barrel.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The deadliest French representative since Napoleon, albeit completely opposite in its stature. This ambitious sniper rifle fires 7.62mm NATO rounds very accurately due to its bolt action and thermal shielded barrel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Galil AR from Israel is related to Valmet M76. In fact, the first prototypes were designed from blueprints bought from Valmet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Galil assault rifle is designed for heavy combat. Reliability and lethality in one package.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the shortened version of the Galil, easier to handle for paratroopers and mechanized troops.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the shortened version of the Galil AR. It is easier to handle for troops that are used to work under tight conditions.

ITEM.szItemDesc: There are big guns, there are big, big guns, and then there's this gun. Bring shoulder pads.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ugly as sin, but so what? Whether it's knocking the treads off a tank or popping an enemy combatant like a water balloon, this gun makes it easy to feel like God.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A slightly more compact version of the model 17, the model 19 gives you the same reliable 9mm Glock action.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A slightly more compact version of the model 17, the model 19 gives you the same reliable 9mm Glock action.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A bull-pup design of the AKS-74U in 7.62mm WP. This particular variant has a built-in GP-25 grenade launcher. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Groza is a neat little weapon, but not recommended for lefties due the placement of its cocking handle, selector switch and ejection port. This variant comes with an integral GP-25 40mm grenade launcher.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Putting a silencer on this already subsonic rifle can help you keep a low profile and stay stylish in any urban combat enviroment. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Putting a silencer on this already subsonic rifle can help you keep a low profile and stay stylish in any urban combat enviroment. Fires 9x39mm Subsonic ammo that is highly armor effective.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The HK 23E is a light 5.56mm NATO MG and is of the same quality one would expect from Heckler and Koch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The manufacturer's name says it all. We highly recommend the HK 23E. It's reliable and does the job effectively with 100-rounds in a Beta C-Mag. Includes bipod.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Combine the best features of the G36 and the M4 with Heckler & Koch's HK416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: After fixing England's SA80, now Heckler & Koch wants to improve America's M4. The HK416 is available in both an upgrade kit for M4s or as a complete weapon with a HK made lower receiver.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A personal defence weapon designed to compliment the G11 rifle, the G11 PDW was rumored to only be in the prototype phase.
ITEM.szBRDesc: SPECIAL! Available for a limited time only: G11 sidearm prototypes with glow-in-the-dark keychain!

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G36 is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, made from mostly modern materials and using mostly modern technologies. The G36C is the compact version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, made from mostly modern materials and using mostly modern technologies. The G36C is the compact or commando version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G36 RAS is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, made from mostly modern materials and using mostly modern technologies.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 RAS is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, using mostly modern materials and technologies. Unlike the 'E'-version, the 'RAS' is outfitted with Picatinny rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G36 RAS is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, using mostly modern materials and technologies. The G36K RAS is the carbine version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 RAS is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, using mostly modern materials and technologies. The G36K RAS is the carbine version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The smallest G3 variant, the G3KA4 features a 12.4 inch barrel, but is still chambered for the same 7.62mm rounds as its bigger brother.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A smaller version of the venerable G3, this baby packs a killer right hook at both ends. The recoil of these rifles is almost as legendary as their stopping power

ITEM.szItemDesc: Not as bulky or heavy as other LMG's, this gun still has a rate of fire that will frappe an enemy in no time.
ITEM.szBRDesc: HK has blessed us with their new versatile, multi-role squad machine gun. This version is outfitted with Picatinny rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The latest LMG from HK is gas-operated, belt-fed, and air-cooled. An integral bipod and RIS rails give you lots of room for addons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: First shown in 2001 in London, the all-new MG43 continues HK's long standing tradition of fine weaponry. Comes standard with integral bipod. Since 2006 it's introduced in the Bundeswehr (German Army) as the MG4.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A large pistol designed to meet the exacting requirements of the US Special Operations Command.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A large pistol designed to meet the exacting requirements of the US Special Operations Command. If it's good enough for SOCOM, it's good enough for you!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is yet another version of the tried and true MP5, by H&K. Chambered in 10mm, it's a compromise between extreme controlability and increased firepower.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MP5A2's bigger, badder brother. Bringing the impressive 10mm cartridge to bear, this SMG bridges the gap between an MP5 and the UMP-45, and is choice in CQB!

ITEM.szItemDesc: A modern SMG for the old Tokarev round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The latest and most modern SMG for the 7.62x25mm round. Comes with integrated folding stock and lasersight in the forward handguard.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MP7 is a compact submachine gun with folding forward grip and telescoped buttstock, and is designed to fire special, high velocity 4.6mm ammunition.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MP7 is a compact submachine gun with folding forward grip and telescoped buttstock, and is designed to fire special, high velocity 4.6mm ammunition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MSG-90 sniper rifle was made by Heckler-Koch as a "militarized" offspring of their PSG-1 police sniper rifle.
