ITEM.szItemDesc: Hollowpoint ammo for the old M1 Carbine.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Hollowpoint ammo for the old M1 Carbine.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Full metal jacket rounds for 6x35mm personal defense weapons, if hollowpoints won't do it any longer.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Full metal jacket rounds for 6x35mm personal defense weapons, if hollowpoints won't do it any longer.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Hollowpoint ammo for 6x35mm PDW-class guns.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Here's what you need for your shiny new 6x35mm PDW: hollowpoint bullets for anti-personnel work.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The new 6.8x43mm SPC special forces ammo. More range and effect than the standard NATO-5.56mm round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The new 6.8x43mm SPC special forces ammo. More range and effect than the standard NATO-5.56mm round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 6.8x43mm Special Purpose Cartridge was developed under participation of the special operations comunity, who wanted a round that should be more lethal than the 5.56x45mm. Now they got it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The 6.8x43mm Special Purpose Cartridge was developed under participation of the special operations comunity, who wanted a round that should be more lethal than the 5.56x45mm. Now they got it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 12-gauge Masterkey shotgun can be mounted under standard rifles as a breaching tool when used with special ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Tired of having to pack an Assault Rifle and an additional Shotgun? With this specially adapted shotgun, you can carry 2 in 1!

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M18 Claymore directional mine can be triggered by a remote detonator, by a tripwire or simply be used as a mine. 700 steel balls will be fired in a 60 degree arc, maximum height of 2 m. Tip: Front towards enemy.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Lay ambushes with networks of tripwire and these babies. Can also be activated remotely. We accept no responsibility for casulties due to setting it up in the wrong way.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you want to build intricate, complex systems of mines, you'll need tripwire to connect your devices. You know you want to.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Tripwire for mines. Only 10 bucks per meter, just this week!

ITEM.szItemDesc: This simple sling prevents you from losing your gun in the heat of combat.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Don't waste time putting your rifle back into your inventory. With this you can just drop your rifle and grab your trusted sidearm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Put this device on your bombs. You can safely disarm a planted bomb via remote control, provided you know the correct frequency.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Put this device on your bombs. You can safely disarm a planted bomb via remote control, provided you know the correct frequency.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This sophisticated device allows you to either arm or disarm a bomb. No evil mastermind's plan would work without these...
ITEM.szBRDesc: Blow up an entire city, or be the hero and turn a off doomsday device? With this equipment, the choice is yours.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This standard stun grenade has been rigged with string, resulting in a simple, although quite effective, makeshift mine.
This standard tear gas grenade has been rigged with string, resulting in a simple, although quite effective, makeshift mine.
This standard mustard gas grenade has been rigged with string, resulting in a simple, although quite effective, makeshift mine.
This standard mini grenade has been rigged with string, resulting in a simple, although quite effective, makeshift mine.
This standard MK2 grenade has been rigged with string, resulting in a simple, although quite effective, makeshift mine.
This emergency flare has been rigged with string, resulting in a simple, although quite effective, makeshift mine.
This smoke grenade has been rigged with string, resulting in a simple, although quite effective, makeshift mine.
This combat drug increases physical strength to impressive levels for a short time. Side effects include greatly increased aggresiveness and the risk of heart attack.
This combat drug increases reflexes and reaction times... while it lasts. Afterwards the effects reverse. May cause paranoia.
Temporarily enhances vision, but puts a heavy strain on the eyes.
Allows great physical feats and increases your endurance, while your mind goes haywire.
This antidote can cure poison over time. WARNING: May cause temporary blindness and a severe migraine.
A bunch of rugged, empty bags. What could you possibly store in there?
ITEM.szBRDesc: Only a fool would not fortify his position, especially at these prices!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Whenever you need fortification, flood control, or cheap weight lifting equipment, these come in handy.
A cheap way of denying access to areas. Be careful, don't hurt yourself while planting this.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Useful for serious fortification of your base, and ruining your fatigues in the process.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Perfect for digging your own grave, hitting people over the head (and then dig their grave) or building makeshift fortifications.
Because normal food is sooo 2011.
An individual food ration in use with the US military.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If its good for the US army, it better be good enough for you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: German army food. Beware the Raviolis!
ITEM.szBRDesc: This box of german army food will bring you through the day. Note the cookies, which also serve as burning material.

ITEM.szItemDesc: It better taste better than it looks...
A small bottle of vitamins and steroids.
Butchery leftovers with old bread. Enjoy.
For some obscure reason, this is also sold outside Hamburg.
Or 'Freedom Fries', as some people like to call them.
Favourite food of couch potatoes and sewer-based squads of tortoise ninjas everywhere.
Spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, baked beans, spam, spam, spam and spam.
Spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, spam, lovely spam, wonderful spam!
ITEM.szBRDesc: Hey, at least it doesn't fill up your mailbox...

ITEM.szItemDesc: These vegetables will stay edible forever, much to children's dismay.
How about something exotic? Like poisonous insects?
ITEM.szBRDesc: We were assured this is actually eaten in some place we forgot.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Seriously? You really think about eating this? You should rethink this assignment...
Tip: Best served with spam.
The best arulcan steak you'll find in .. Arulco.
A mexican-style bean stew. Really hot!
Mhmm, breakfast!
A spinach and mushroom crepe.
Italian pasta.
Omelet du fromage. Or not?
Sure, you can eat it right now. Cooking is for wussies, eh?
You have to be a tough guy to kill them, but an even tougher guy to eat them!
A loaf of bread, made from grain of local farms.
A delicious applepie made from tasty arulcan apples. Don't you do anything naughty with it!
A rusty old water barrel.
A bottle with 1 liter of still mineral water.
ITEM.szBRDesc: 1 liter of healthy mineral water, in a one-use bottle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A drink that is so nutritious, it also stills your hunger (a bit).
ITEM.szBRDesc: For those without teeth who want to eat vegetables.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Cow milk, 1 liter.
You can almost taste the yummy chemicals that went into this.
Both tastes and refreshes like a kick in the belly.
Apparently some people can get hooked to this stuff.
Contains everything necessary to clean your gun in the field.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Even the most deadly tools of destruction need to be looked after from time to time..

ITEM.szItemDesc: Normal Arulcan clothes. Absolutely nothing to see here.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Since when does this shop sell cheap clothes?

ITEM.szItemDesc: A true Assassin's choice. The slightest skin contact will kill the target in under a minute. No salvation possible.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Yo man, we just got these ultracool poison darts. This'll kill an elephant! Just be careful not to touch this by accident, like poor Jimmy from the export department.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In skilled hands, a deadly weapon. In unskilled hands, you better use your fists.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Easily concealable, lightweigth, maintenance-free. Though you might want to reconsider if your victim sees you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A fresh corpse.
This little device enables your rifle to fire grenades. A loaded magazine is required, and obviously no other firing mdoes are possible while there is a grenade attached.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Transform your WW2 rifleman into a WW2 grenadier.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Favourite food of horses, but not children, everywhere.
One of the most consumed goods ever.

ITEM.szBRDesc: 42 little jeans had to lose their skin to create this jean pair of pants. So please buy it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Part of the uniform of the armed administrative and regular branch of the arulcan army.
If you can read this, Flugente propably didn't catch a certain way to create items. Go blame him!
If you can read this, Flugente propably didn't catch a certain way to create items. Go blame him!
If you want to arrest someone, it is helpful to keep them from using their hands.
If applied correctly, this stun gun will hit anyone it touches with over 2 million volts. In case you find yourself in need of a drooling, helpless victim.
ITEM.szBRDesc: At 2 million V, this baby will leave even the sturdiest men helpless on the floor. Batteries are not included!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Well, its better than flailing your ams helplessly.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Repel any thug with this pepper spray. Spray into his face for best effect.

ITEM.szItemDesc: If you think you need to carry several of these, consider moving out of town.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Though one might think so, putting this on your food is not the best idea you could have.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This mask, in conjunction with a diving bottle, allows you to stay underwater.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Whenever you feel you could go down, be sure to protect your eyes and retain vision with one of these.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Contains enough oxygen to stay underwater for many minutes.
What you'll lose in maneuverability on land you'll gain in water.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not only can you swim much faster with these, you'll also be the star of every penguin-themed costume party.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Surprisingly, this also works on people, as a very poor man's handcuff.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Useful for sorting your cables. This stack should be enough for your office.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A hundred insanely poisonous darts. Why do you need so many?
ITEM.szBRDesc: We are now providing several types of ammunition in bulk. Please note the prices and weights of ammunition crates before purchasing.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A very strong animal tranquilizer. Lethal if overdosed, and you are not an elephant.

This Twin Beam Laser Aiming Module is meant to fit on modern rifle rail interface systems. Though larger and heavier, it has a longer useful range than (Pistol) Trigger Guard mounted types. Requires NVG to operate.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Twin Beam Laser Aiming Module is meant to fit on modern rifle rail interface systems. Though larger and heavier, it has a longer useful range than (Pistol) Trigger Guard mounted types.

ITEM.szItemDesc: I am... the light! No wait, that ain't right. I'm just a flashlight. But I'm still useful. Can be fixated on a gun in an improvised manner.
ITEM.szBRDesc: We say: let there be light! Batteries included.

ITEM.szItemDesc: I am... the light! No wait, that ain't right. I'm just a flashlight. But I'm still useful. Can be fixated on a gun in an improvised manner.
An official USPS letter opener. Boldly engraved on the handle is the warning property of the government - "do not remove from postal station".
An effective implement used for prunning.
Tripwire can be deployed directly from this roll. Also you can use a knife to cut it in smaller pieces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A roll of tripwire. In case you need to boobytrap your house, your car, and your cat.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A 15-round M1 magazine with hollowpoint ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Hollowpoint rounds for the old M1 Carbine.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is the perfect holster to store a small handheld shotgun in.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the perfect holster to store a small handheld shotgun in.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Swords and sabers and broadswords holds comfortably In these half-sheath.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Swords and sabers and broadswords holds comfortably In these half-sheath.

ITEM.szItemDesc: With this sling, you can carry additional gun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: With sthis sling, you can carry additional gun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This tactical sling will allow to stabilize the rifle when shooting, as it aids stability by tensioning the rifle against the support arm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This tactical sling will allow to stabilize the rifle when shooting, as it aids stability by tensioning the rifle against the support arm.

ITEM.szBRDesc: This set can be used to radio other squad in other sectors. It can be worn like a combat pack. Batteries are included.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A battery used in standard field equipment. Quite heavy, but can last for weeks if you conserve it.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A standard issue field battery for radio sets.

ITEM.szBRDesc: The red smoke from this signal shell clearly marks an area - visible even at night.

Index 1706
Index 1707
Index 1708
A basic sleeeping bag. Beats the bare floor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: No more sleeping on the dirty floor! Sweet dreams, sugar.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Use Rag as First Aid Kit with risk of poisoning.Use Alcohol on Rag to sterilize it.Combine Rubber Band with Sterile Rag to make Trauma Pack.Take apart Trauma Pack and First Aid Kit for some useful items.

You can empty any filled jar.Use Rag on Bloody Knife to clean it.Cut off small pieces from Duct Tape using Utility Knife.Make Garotte from Platinum Watch and String.Tear up any shirt or pants to make Rags.

Tear up Sandbag into Rags and String.Make improvised Sandbag from any Shirt.Combine Rag, String and Wood Camo to make Wood Helmet Cover.Combine Rag, String and Desert Camo to make Desert Helmet Cover.

Combine Rag, String and Quick Glue to make AR-Mag/Grenade Pouch.Combine Rag, Rubber Band and Quick Glue to make Canteen/Utility Pouch.Use Utility Knife on Walkman to get Copper Wire.Cut off Tripwire from Tripwire Roll using Utility Knife.
Add Tripwire to Tripwire Roll to store it.Use Utility Knife on Camo uniform to make basic LBE Gear.

Add Rag to Alcohol to make Molotov Cocktail.Make improvised Ampulomet from Discarded Law, Duct Tape, Rod, Steel tube and Platter.You can separate TNT/HMX into 4 TNT/HMX Sticks that can be thrown as grenades.
Combine Jar and Mini Grenade to make Jar Mini Bomb.Combine Jar and Mk2 grenade to make Jar Mk2 bomb.Combine Jar and Stun grenade to make Jar Stun Bomb.Combine Jar and RGO to make Jar RGO Bomb.

Combine Jar with C1/C4 small and Copper Wire to make Jar C1/C4 bomb.Combine Napalm Bomb with Mortar Shell to make 60mm Napalm Shell.Combine Napalm Cocktail with Mortar Shell to make 60mm Napalm Shell.Apply RDX to C1 to make C4.Apply RDX to TNT to make HMX.
Combine RDX with Marbles to make RDX Bomb.Add Oil to Gas Tank to make Gasoline-Oil mix.Apply Gas Tank to Oil to make Napalm Fuel.Combine Gasoline-Oil Mix with Alcohol/Wine/Beer to make Napalm Bomb.
You can separate C1/C4 into two small C1/C2 pieces.Apply RDX to Rag to make Improvised Fuse.Combine String with Grenade to create Makeshift Mine.Disassemble Makeshift Mine into String and Grenade.

Combine Detonator with Copper Wire to make Remote Detonator.Combine Remote Detonator with Copper Wire to make Remote Defuse.Combine Remote Defuse with Copper Wire to make Remote Combo.Use Utility Knife on VOG-25/VOG-25P to make Khattabka VOG-25/VOG-25P.

Combine explosives using Duct Tape.Alcohol, Oil, Gas Tank, Gasoline-Oil Mix and Marbles add explosive effects to bombs and grenades when attached.Attach any gun to tripwire to make directional gun trap.Attach any grenade to Tripwire and plant it as bomb.
Open to read the recipe.
Should not be seen in the game.

The hand-held anti-tank grenade launcher is a cheap, robust and simple but effective reuseable weapon. It can be utilized against armoured vehicles and buildings.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This first generation hand-held anti-tank grenade launcher is a cheap, robust and simple but effective reuseable weapon. It can be utilized against armoured vehicles and buildings.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A shorter version of the standard HK 416, chambered in 7.62x35mm Blackout.
Combine the best features of the G36 and the M4 with Heckler & Koch's HK416. This variant is chambered in 7.62x35mm Blackout.
This has a barrel that is slightly longer than on the standard HK 416 and is chambered in 7.62x35mm Blackout.
The DMR variant of the HK 416, chambered in 7.62x35mm Blackout.
This AR-15 based gun is very short and extremely silent, while still firing the full power cartridge 7.62x35mm Blackout.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Multi-Purpose Weapon from Advanced Armament Corp. combines the punch of an assault rifle with the quietness and size of a submachine gun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AR-15 derivate from Alexander Arms is chambered in 6.5x38mm Grendel and comes with a 24" barrel, suited for sniper duty.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This AR-15 derivate from Alexander Arms is chambered in 6.5x38mm Grendel and comes with a 24" barrel, suited for sniper duty.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AR-15 derivate from Alexander Arms is chambered in 6.5x38mm Grendel. With its 20" barrel it can serve as designated marskman rifle for extended combat distances.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This AR-15 derivate from Alexander Arms is chambered in 6.5x38mm Grendel. With its 20" barrel it can serve as designated marskman rifle for extended combat distances.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A AR-15 derivate from Alexander Arms, chambered in 6.5x38mm Grendel. This Mid-Length Carbine is suited for medium combat distances.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A AR-15 derivate from Alexander Arms, chambered in 6.5x38mm Grendel. This Mid-Length Carbine is suited for medium combat distances.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 7.62x51mm bolt-action rifle uses straight-pull technology to make chambering a new round a bit faster.
This .338 Lapua bolt-action rifle uses straight-pull technology to make chambering a new round a bit faster.

The PPK-20 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics. This version can fire overpressured armor-piercing 7N31 9x19mm ammunition. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the submachine gun version of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The AK-12U combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers. This version fires 5.45x39mmm from a 50-round quad stack magazine. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 5.45x39mm shortened variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 7.62x39mm shortened variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 7.62x39mm shortened variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 9x39mm shortened variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 9x39mm shortened variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers. This version fires 5.45x39mmm from a 50-round quad stack magazine. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 5.45x39mmm variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 7.62x39mm variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 7.62x39mm variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 9x39mm variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the 9x39mm variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the semi-automatic shotgun version of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the semi-automatic shotgun version of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The RPK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics. This version fires from a 5.45x39mm 95-shot drum. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the light machine gun version of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The SVK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics. This version uses 10-shot dragunov magazines. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fresh from prototype state, the designated marksman rifle version of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The RG-6 rapid-fire grenade launcher holds up to six caseless VOG-25 grenades. It's design resembles in many parts the South-African Milkor MGL grenade launcher.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This rapid firing multi-shot launcher offers tremendous firepower in urban combat situations.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This machine pistol surely won't win in a beauty contest, but it is constructed sturdy enough to withstand even the pressure of 7N31 ammunition and the trigger guard can act as hand grip.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This machine pistol surely won't win in a beauty contest, but it is constructed sturdy enough to withstand even the pressure of 7N31 ammunition and the trigger guard can act as hand grip.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Originally developed for the first World War, this variant of the Browning Automatic Rifle saw widespread use by allied forces in the second one and beyond. The barrel is not quick-detachable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Originally developed for the first World War, this variant of the Browning Automatic Rifle saw widespread use by allied forces in the second one and beyond. The barrel is not quick-detachable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This underbarrel shotgun with a detachable magazine is easier to operate, quicker reloaded and weights far less than the KAC Masterkey.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This underbarrel shotgun with a detachable magazine is easier to operate, quicker reloaded and weights far less than the KAC Masterkey.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An unorthodox shotgun in bullpup layout, with top and bottom rails and dual feed system. In some parts it resembles the South-African Neostead shotgun.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An unorthodox shotgun in bullpup layout, with top and bottom rails and dual feed system. In some parts it resembles the South-African Neostead shotgun.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Kel-Tec KSG has two tubular magazines, that can be switched by a lever.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Integral UB Weapon for KSG simulating a 2nd Magazine.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Neostead has two tubular magazines, that can be switched by a lever.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Integral UB Weapon for Neostead simulating a 2nd Magazine.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This light machine gun, also known as the C-9 and M-249, has been known to moonlight as a beefed-up assault rifle. This version is chambered in 6.8x43mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reputed for its reliability, this Belgian machine gun is gas operated, with a simple rotating bolt system. Its design was adopted by the US Army as the M249 machine gun. This version is chambered in 6.8x43mm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: AR-15 variant chambered in .300 Whisper, with integral silencer and picatinny rails.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Both for hunting animals or larger prey, the whispering death's stunning accuray and stopping power will suprise you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The current standard issue rifle of the Russian Army, a slightly improved version of the old AK-74. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Modernized version of the old AK-74, featuring a side-folding stock, a standardized side-mount bracket and polymer furniture.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine holds 18 rounds of 9mm ball ammunition. Although small, this ammo travels at rather high velocities, making it the preferred sidearm round to many military and law enforcement personnel.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These 18 rounds of fine quality 115 grain Fiocchi round tip ammunition are ideal for anyone looking for an economical means of personal defense.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This magazine contains 18 rounds of 9mm federal-135-grain hollow point ammo. While its armor piercing capabilities are questionable, its tendency to expand in tissue more than makes up for its weaknesses.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 18-round magazine of COR-BON 9mm Jacketed Hollow Point ammunition is truly the top of the line. It's a definite deterrent against any unarmored assailant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: AET ammo has expansion and armor piercing capabilities for double the punch, but can make your weapon somewhat unreliable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When your hollow points fall off the enemies armor and the armor piercers do not deal enough damage, then it's time to pack these puppies.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Glaser ammunition has double the impact of standard hollow point ammo. Unfortunately, it also has twice as much difficulty penetrating armor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Fifteen rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Tracer ammunition in 9mm. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The LMG version of the M4 assault rifle.
This light machine gun, also known as the C-9 and M-249, has been known to moonlight as a beefed-up assault rifle.
The FN Minimi SPW (Special Purpose Weapon) is a lighter version of the standard Minimi, with Para type buttstock and rail adapters.
Designed by the Compania de Estudios Tecnicos de Materiales Especiales, the Ameli looks as if it was derived from the MG42, but its mechanism is quite different.
The latest LMG from HK is gas-operated, belt-fed, and air-cooled. An integral bipod and RIS rails give you lots of room for addons.
Simple and reliable (if heavy) the A6's firepower was favored by American paratroopers during WW2. The barrel is not quick-detachable.

When the Germans build up the Bundeswehr they took the MG42, renamed it MG3, and took down the firing rate somewhat. Because, it was still the best GPMG of the world at that time. In use in several other countries as well.
The M60E3 is a smaller, lighter and improved version of the legendary M60 light machinegun used by the US Armed Forces.
The FN MAG was developed in the early 50s, and is still widely used today. It is very reliable and will work even in the worst conditions.
This German infantry support weapon is a (not so) light machine gun that helps you pump up while mowing down your opposition.
The Pecheneg machine gun is an upgraded PKM. It's currently in limited production and has been issued on trial basis for some Russian troops in Chechnya. The barrel is not quick-detachable.
The PKM is the Russian eqvivalent of the US M60. It's a universal MG that fires the heavy Russian 7.62x54mm round instead of the 7.62x39mm WP.
The MP-5N was orignally developed for US Navy SEALs and features a integral flashlight.
A heavily modified FAL, its compact size, portability, light weight, and power combine to make this a formidable battle rifle. Comes with an integral flashlight.
Depending on what ammo you need to fire, the Benelli M3 convertible Shotgun can switch immediately from pump-action to semi-auto or vice-versa.
Designed as a police weapon from the ground up, it was introduced in 1979.
This fearsome looking Italian semi-automatic assault shotgun has been banned in several countries.
An AK-clone; this carbine was designed for export to other nations. Can be field repaired.
More powerful than its predecessor AK-74, this rifle employs many of today's new technologies. Long live the AK-47! Can be field repaired.
From the AK-100 line of clones, the AK-104 carbine is chambered for 7.62 WP. Can be field repaired.
This AK-100 variant fires the 5.45x39mm cartridge. Can be field repaired.
One of the new Alexandrov-Kalashnikovs on the market, this AR is lean, mean, reliable, and accurate. What more do you want, really? Can be field repaired.
The 5.56x45 has finally invaded Russia. Like the Beatles in 1962, it's new, but it's popular. The AK-108 is a NATO standard Alexandrov-Kalashnikov . Go figure. Can be field repaired.
This light machine gun, also known as the C-9 and M-249, has been known to moonlight as a beefed-up assault rifle. This version is chambered in 6.8x43mm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M4 is a high quality, very versatile shotgun, and is very popular as a police weapon, and as a civilian weapon for self defense.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M4 uses an inertia recoil semi-automatic system which allows to the shooter to lock the semi-automatic action and switch to the manually operated pump-action mode and back in the matter of seconds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A wall of buckshot as fast as you can pull the trigger, ideal for home defense and tense family gatherings.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Modeled after the AK-47, the Saiga is a well designed and affordable semi-automatic shotgun with a host of personal defense and tactical applications.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Control riots with this 12 round semi-auto shotgun like never before.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the US made version of the South-African Striker shotgun. The key advantage of this shotgun is its large magazine capacity, but it is slow to reload.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An older French SMG that can be folded down to a small package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is a fullauto-only French Army SMG, unlike the police versions that have semiauto, too. The magazine well can be folded along the barrel for easy storage and acts as a foregrip.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Swedish SMG and its variants have been in service with the Swedish military since 1937.
ITEM.szBRDesc: No stranger to armed conflict, make this rugged 9mm SMG yours today.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This SMG provided more than fifty years of reliability and accuracy to British armed forces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This SMG provided more than fifty years of reliability and accuracy to British armed forces.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Long in use with the Italian Police, this is an easy to use SMG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The built-in foregrip on this older Beretta SMG lets you handle the gun easily even if the folding stock has not been deployed.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An ugly SMG developed with reliability as its main focus (besides spitting lead).
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Italian SMG is very reliable due to some very interesting design features, like forcing air around the barrel with every shot to keep it cool.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The most well-known SMG in the world, and not without good reason.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Since its introduction in 1948, the Uzi has supplanted the Thompson as the household word in SMG's.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This SMG was in use by German police before they switched to HK weapons (around 1985).
ITEM.szBRDesc: Surplus weapons for the serious gun collector. The MPL was used extensively by German police forces prior to 1985.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MP-5N was orignally developed for US Navy SEALs and features an integral flashlight.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Modern version of the MP-5 developed for US Navy SEALs. Comes with an integral flashlight and the barrel is threaded to accept US-made detachable silencers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MP-5N was orignally developed for US Navy SEALs and features a integral flashlight.
The MP-5A4, basically, is no more than the scaled-down version of the Heckler-Koch G3 battle rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MP-5A4, basically, is no more than the scaled-down version of the Heckler-Koch G3 battle rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The MP-5A4, basically, is no more than the scaled-down version of the Heckler-Koch G3 battle rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MP-5A4, basically, is no more than the scaled-down version of the Heckler-Koch G3 battle rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A silenced version of the H&K MP-5 with integral silencer and fixed stock of A4 version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A silenced version of the H&K MP-5 with integral silencer and fixed stock of A4 version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A silenced version of the H&K MP-5 with integral silencer and fixed stock of A4 version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A silenced version of the H&K MP-5 with integral silencer and fixed stock of A4 version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This model of the SAF includes an integral silencer.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This silenced SMG is just the thing for your next covert operation.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Swiss designed, Chilean manufactured 9mm SMG.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Strongly influenced by the Sig 540, the SAF adds to the ranks of quality Subguns.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Built off of the M16A2, this SMG has been employed by the USMC, DEA and other military and law enforcement agencies.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This light, manageably sized SMG cranks out 9mm rounds at 900 RPM.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Known as the "Mini Sub Machine Gun" this American model uses a helical-feed 50 round magazine of 9mm bullets, and has been making things right since 1990.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Known as the "Mini Sub Machine Gun" this American model uses a helical-feed 50 round magazine of 9mm bullets, and has been making things right since 1990.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Cheap, simple, and rugged. This motto for Chinese military designs is truly reflected in this mass-produced weapon.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Of Chinese design, the Type-85 submachine gun is a plain blowback weapon that is remarkably lightweight due to its rotating bolt system. The weapon's manufacturers claim that it also fires the subsonic type-64 cartridge.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A modern SMG for the old Tokarev round.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The latest and most modern SMG for the 7.62x25mm round. Comes with integrated folding stock and lasersight in the forward handguard.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This Bizon SMG is chambered to accept 7.62 Tokarev box magazines.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Variety is the spice of life, try out the SMG in its 7.62 Tk variant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The UMP (Universal Machinen-Pistole = Universal Submachine Gun) was developed by the Heckler & Koch company of Germany in the mid- to late- 1990s.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The UMP (Universal Machinen-Pistole = Universal Submachine Gun) was developed by the Heckler & Koch company of Germany in the mid- to late- 1990s.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Yet another version of the H&K MP5, chambered in .40 S&W.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The more popular of the new caliber MP5's, this is the .40 S&W version

ITEM.szItemDesc: This is yet another version of the tried and true MP5, by H&K. Chambered in 10mm, it's a compromise between extreme controlability and increased firepower.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The MP5A2's bigger, badder brother. Bringing the impressive 10mm cartridge to bear, this SMG bridges the gap between an MP5 and the UMP-45, and is choice in CQB!

ITEM.szItemDesc: Almost as light as some heavier pistols, this is the ideal sidearm for the modern Private Military Contractor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A new PDW on the market, this little beauty was made by the Knight Armament Corporation and fires the new 6x35mm round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A new upper receiver for the 5.7x28mm round, placed onto a M16 lower receiver. This configuration uses standard P90-magazines. The longer barrel gets more range out of this round than the P90 does, however.
A new upper receiver for the 5.7x28mm round, placed onto a M16 lower receiver. This configuration uses standard P90-magazines.

A new upper receiver for the 5.7x28mm round, placed onto a M16 lower receiver. This configuration uses standard P90-magazines. As the barrel is just 6" long, range is just a bit more than most pistols.
The shortened version of the M16, favored by special forces in Vietnam.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Initially, the CAR-15 showed some problems. First, it was too loud. Second, the muzzle flash was also terrific. Colt partially solved this problem by installing a new, longer flash suppressor. This model was officially adopted as the XM177-E1.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This mini version of the M16 is a prized tool for knocking off noisy neighbors and petty dictators.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Very small, and yet, very deadly. The Colt 733 Commando is an attractively short and concealable assault rifle that was based on the M16 design. It is extremely popular among several US armed forces.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Combine the best features of the G36 and the M4 with Heckler & Koch's HK416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: After fixing England's SA80, now Heckler & Koch wants to improve America's M4. The HK416 is available in both an upgrade kit for M4s or as a complete weapon with a HK made lower receiver.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A shorter version of the standard HK 416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is just a HK 416 with a shorter barrel, for those who often do CQB.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Known throughout the middle east as the MAR Tactical, the Micro Galil is IMI's latest and most compact entry in the Galil family of assault weapons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A redesigned version of Galil MAR, with a completely new, thicker and much better protecting hand guard, a carbon-fibre folding stock instead of a steel one, and an extra standard rail.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G36 is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, made from mostly modern materials and using mostly modern technologies. The G36C is the compact version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, made from mostly modern materials and using mostly modern technologies. The G36C is the compact or commando version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Only two inches longer than the MP5 submachine gun, the HK53 provides all the hard-hitting firepower of the 5.56mm caliber in a compact package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Only two inches longer than the MP5 submachine gun, the HK53 provides all the hard-hitting firepower of the 5.56mm caliber in a compact package.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The XM-8 is HK's response to the USA's call for a new standard Army rifle. The BLC version is the standard, and offers a versatile array of options.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The new XM-8 family of weapons is spearheading the "next gen" infantry weapons movement, after the OICW contract went belly up.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G36K is the carbine version of the G36. This non-export comes standard with a built-in reflex scope.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, made from mostly modern materials and using mostly modern technologies. The G36K is the carbine version, and comes standard with a built-in reflex scope.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An AK-clone; this carbine was designed for export to other nations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: While not as compact as the AKS-74U, this carbine's marginally longer barrel offers better performance. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: An AK-clone; this carbine was designed for export to other nations. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: While not as compact as the AKS-74U, this carbine's marginally longer barrel offers better performance. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

The scaled down version of the SIG 550, this 5.56mm carbine is excellent for CQB, with integrated flash hider and removable bipod.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The 552 is a extraordinarily well made carbine. Equipped with a side folding skeletonized stock and a flash suppressor. Order one now and get a free folding bipod with purchase!

ITEM.szItemDesc: The shorter barrel of this SIG 550 variant is a heck of a lot more convenient in close quarters.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The shorter barrel of this SIG 550 variant is a heck of a lot more convenient in closer quarters. Includes flash suppressor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: FN's latest addition to the SCAR family is the "L" or Light version, chambered in 5.56mm NATO. The CQC version is for MOUT or dense terrain.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The FN SCAR was designed to be more customizable than any other weapon, period. Experts agree: it's nearly perfect. This version is chambered for the lighter 5.56mm NATO round.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G36 RAS is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, using mostly modern materials and technologies. The G36K RAS is the carbine version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 RAS is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, using mostly modern materials and technologies. The G36K RAS is the carbine version.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Commonly used by the Russian Spetsnaz, the muzzle flash from this SMG's short barrel has singed many an eyebrow.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Russian in origin, this sub-machine gun is a shorter version of the AK-74. It's a combat intensive weapon with a bulbous muzzle attachment to compensate for firing 5.45mm Soviet rifle cartridges in a much shorter barrel.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AK-100 variant fires the 5.45x39mm cartridge.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The world just could not do without another Avtomat-Kalashnikova carbine, this time in 5.45mm. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AK-100 variant fires the 5.45x39mm cartridge. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The world just could not do without another Avtomat-Kalashnikova carbine, this time in 5.45mm. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AK-100 variant fires the 5.45x39mm cartridge. Can be field repaired.
This AK-100 variant fires the 5.45x39mm cartridge.

Variant of the AKMS, which is a variant of the standard AKM. Was made shorter for special units and paratroopers. U-shaped buttplate of folding stock allows folding/unfolding while a magazine is inserted.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This even more shortened variant of the AKM comes with a folding stock that allows folding/unfolding while a magazine is in the gun. It was developed for paratroopers and special units, and is quite functional despite the rather unusual foregrip.

ITEM.szItemDesc: From the AK-100 line of clones, the AK-104 carbine is chambered for 7.62 WP.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Exported from Izhevsk straight to the regional/sectarian conflict of your choice. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

This is the shortened version of the Galil, easier to handle for paratroopers and mechanized troops.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the shortened version of the Galil AR. It is easier to handle for troops that are used to work under tight conditions.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The SCAR is FN's newest offering into the military armament scene. The "WP" refers to this version firing the 7.62mm WP round. CQC denotes the shortest version for fighting in dense terrain.
Developed for Special Forces to enable using battlefield pick-up magazines, this gun is essentially a M4 chambered for 7.62x39mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If the Russians make some of their guns in NATO calibers, we can do it the other way around. Developed for tunnel-fighting and using AK-47 magazines, this 7.62x39mm M4-variant comes with a sound suppressor. Only very few available..

ITEM.szItemDesc: Folding stock assault carbine in use with Russian security and counter-terror forces.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The modernized version of the Vikhr SR-3 puts forward a folding foregrip, 30-round magazine and a new sound suppressor.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Despite having stopping power in a small package, this was a not so popular gun, due to high maintenace requirements and low controllability in fullauto fire.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An even shorter version of the G3KA4 battle rifle, this was made in Great Britain for the SAS.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The SCAR is FN's newest offering into the military armament scene. The "H" stands for "Heavy", and refers to this version firing the 7.62mm NATO round. CQC denotes the shortest version for fighting in dense terrain.
ITEM.szBRDesc: US SOCOM issued a solicitation for the procurement of SOF Combat Assault Rifles (SCAR) in 2003, and this is what FN came up with. Widely customizable and extremely durable; if ever a gun had promise, the SCAR does.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This CQC version of the SCAR-L has been converted to fire the 6.8mm SPC round.

Italian designed and manufactured assault rifle, the AR-70/90 can be a platform for a dazzling array of attachments.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Yet another Kalashnikov-inspired weapon, this 5.56mm assault rifle has a quality all its own.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Harder hitting than a hangover from a night of downing German lager, this G41 will quickly become your enemy's headache.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Built to NATO weapons standards, this assault rifle is a great piece of German engineering. It features an ejection port dust cover and a hold-open device to keep the bolt open when emptying the mag.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The improved version of the M16. Modified due to experience from Vietnam.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M16's deficiencies began to dissolve with this model. Ammo was now loaded with powders that produce much less residue in the gun action. Barrel, chamber, and bolt are chrome-lined to improve corrosion resistance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The improved version of the M16. Modified due to experience from Vietnam.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The M16's deficiencies began to dissolve with this model. Ammo was now loaded with powders that produce much less residue in the gun action. Barrel, chamber, and bolt are chrome-lined to improve corrosion resistance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The latest in the M16 series, the M16A4 features "flat top" receivers and Picatinny rails for increased accessory compatibility.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The latest model M16 assault rifle has everything the A2 had and more. With the built-in Picatinny rail system, it can be outfitted with all the accessories you ever wanted.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The latest in the M16 series, the M16A4 features "flat top" receivers and Picatinny rails for increased accessory compatibility.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The latest model M16 assault rifle has everything the A2 had and more. With the built-in Picatinny rail system, it can be outfitted with all the accessories you ever wanted.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A red headed bastard step child of the Eastern AK-47 and the Western M-16, this Belgian beauty has an integral flash suppressor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A red headed bastard step child of the Eastern AK-47 and the Western M-16, this Belgian beauty has an integral flash suppressor and a Swedish twin. In the words of Gershwin, who could ask for anything more... besides a lighter trigger pull.

ITEM.szItemDesc: In addition to seeing service world-wide, the SG540 has been a prototype for the development of several other firearms.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Built on an AK-style platform, this assault rifle has gone on to father little variants of its own.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G36 is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle. This non-export model comes standard with a built-in reflex scope.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, made from mostly modern materials and using mostly modern technologies. This non-export model comes standard with a built-in reflex scope.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The G36 RAS is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, made from mostly modern materials and using mostly modern technologies.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The G36 RAS is a conventional gas operated, selective fire rifle, using mostly modern materials and technologies. Unlike the 'E'-version, the 'RAS' is outfitted with Picatinny rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Sharpshooter version of the XM-8 is the Next Gen DMR, featuring a much longer, match grade, long-twist barrel for accuracy over longer ranges.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Sharpshooter version of the XM-8 is the Next Gen DMR, featuring a much longer, match grade, long-twist barrel for accuracy over longer ranges.

ITEM.szItemDesc: FN's latest addition to the SCAR family is the "L" or Light version, chambered in 5.56mm NATO. This is the sniper variant.
A Swiss 5.56mm rifle with removable bipod and integral flash suppressor, this one will leave your enemies like dairy products of a similar nationality.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Swiss 5.56mm rifle with removable bipod and integral flash suppressor, this one will leave your enemies like dairy products of a similar nationality.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 5.56x45 has finally invaded Russia. Like the Beatles in 1962, it's new, but it's popular. The AK-108 is a NATO standard Alexandrov-Kalashnikov . Go figure.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Who says Russians can't use NATO ammunition? Not the Russians! The AK-108 is built for the 5.56mm round, and performs admirably with it's new partner. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 5.56x45 has finally invaded Russia. Like the Beatles in 1962, it's new, but it's popular. The AK-108 is a NATO standard Alexandrov-Kalashnikov . Go figure. Can be field repaired.

As the mini version of the M16, this weapon is small but deadly. Used by many armed forces and law enforcement organizations.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Small, light and deadly, the M4A1 is extremely effective in close quarter battles. If you like the M16, you'll love the M4.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This rifle shouts the Canuck motto, 'Anything the Yanks can do, we can do better.' This version of the M-16 is every merc's dream come true.
ITEM.szBRDesc: It's the Canadian version of the American M16A2. Trust those crazy Canucks to incorporate such safety devices as a case deflector to prevent empty cases from being flung into the faces of left-handed firers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The DMR variant of the HK 416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A Designated Marksman Rifle based on the Heckler & Koch 416.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This has a barrel that is slightly longer than on the standard HK 416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you want more range than a standard 416 has, take this one.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Successor to the AKS-47, this select fire rifle is chambered for 5.45mm rounds and is known for its noise and large muzzle flash.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If the AKS-47 was a Walkman, this baby is an iPod. The modernized 5.45mm version of the rereleased classic comes in just as many colors as its MP3 companion, but is decidedly harder to dance with. That is, of course, unless you're an Islamic Fundamentalist.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The current standard issue rifle of the Russian Army, a slightly improved version of the old AK-74.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Modernized version of the old AK-74, featuring a side-folding stock, a standardized side-mount bracket and polymer furniture.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The new AN-94 Abakan design enables the gun to "pulse", firing a very fast two bullet burst before the recoil affects the user.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This weapon was designed by Gennadiy Nikonov. Another leap forward in gun making, you can be sure to see it soon on a hijacked airliner near you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A relatively recent Russian manufactured AK variant. This model fires 5.45mm rounds.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reckoned to be 15-20% more accurate than the AK-74 by some shooters. Discerning mercenaries should give this assault rifle a try. This model fires 5.45mm rounds.

ITEM.szItemDesc: One of the new Alexandrov-Kalashnikovs on the market, this AR is lean, mean, reliable, and accurate. What more do you want, really?
ITEM.szBRDesc: This addition to the new Alexandrov-Kalashnikov family features an impressive rate of fire, sliding tangent rear sights with a U notch, and a fearsome black phosphate finish. Included is a NPZ Universal Mount with Rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: One of the new Alexandrov-Kalashnikovs on the market, this AR is lean, mean, reliable, and accurate. What more do you want, really? Can be field repaired.

Originally developed for use by APC crews, this AK-47 variant sports a downward folding stock for when swinging space is at a premium.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Designed for portability and versatility with BMP APC's in mind, this AK is the Russian equivalent to a walkman: trendy for its time, practical, and a cause of hearing loss.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Those crazy Czechs and their designations. This time, under their term for SMG there hides a full-power assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: In case you want a 7.62mm WP assault rifle, reconsider your decision to get a cheap AK clone made in someone's backyard. Take this Czech rifle instead, it may cost a bit more, but it also offers higher quality.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This AK copy is not the most stable firing platform, but the forward grip gives you some extra control when it's time to rock and roll. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Despite being devoid of the trademark wood, this gun begs the question: "Does the world really need another Kaloshnikov knockoff?" Our answer is an emphatic "Yes".

ITEM.szItemDesc: Variant of the standard AKM. While making the gun more maneuverable, the folding wire stock is not as stable or comfortable as standard wooden furniture.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This version of the AKM comes with a spiffy folding stock. About as comfortable to put against your shoulder as a lawnmower blade, it's compact size still makes it ideal for paratroopers, mechanized infantry, and anyone wearing a trenchcoat.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Valmet M76 is almost an identical copy of the Rk 62, a high quality AK-47 clone that was developed for the Finnish Defence Forces.

The Robinson Armament XCR-1 is just another M4 clone in 6.8mm SPC.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Another new entry on the 6.8mm SPC market, the XCR-1 comes with a folding stock, which looks a bit unusual on a M4 clone, but works very well.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This sniper variant of the SCAR-L has been converted for the new 6.8x43mm SPC round.
Barrett's entry into the 6.8mm SPC rifle market. A strong and sturdy rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not what you usually expect when you hear 'Barrett', but rest assured that this 6.8mm SPC rifle has the usual high quality and precision of any other Barrett rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Barrett's entry into the 6.8mm SPC rifle market. A strong and sturdy rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Not what you usually expect when you hear 'Barrett', but rest assured that this 6.8mm SPC rifle has the usual high quality and precision of any other Barrett rifle.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Bushmaster M4A3, chambered for the new 6.8mm SPC round.
The smallest G3 variant, the G3KA4 features a 12.4 inch barrel, but is still chambered for the same 7.62mm rounds as its bigger brother.
ITEM.szBRDesc: A smaller version of the venerable G3, this baby packs a killer right hook at both ends. The recoil of these rifles is almost as legendary as their stopping power

ITEM.szItemDesc: Made from sheet metal stampings and plastic furniture, this ugly looking rifle delivers wounds that are equally foul.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Made from sheet metal stampings and plastic furniture, this Heckler and Koch automatic rifle sure ain't pretty, but it is definitely robust, reliable and highly effective.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Made from sheet metal stampings and plastic furniture, this ugly looking rifle delivers wounds that are equally foul.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Made from sheet metal stampings and plastic furniture, this Heckler and Koch automatic rifle sure ain't pretty, but it is definitely robust, reliable and highly effective.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Modelo C is a dependable 7.62mm NATO Spanish Assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The H&K line of rifles got their design and license from the CETME model, which speaks volumes about its performance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Modelo C is a dependable 7.62mm NATO Spanish Assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The H&K line of rifles got their design and license from the CETME model, which speaks volumes about its performance.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A smaller, more versatile version of the widely used Fusil Automatique Leger, this carbine still packs a mighty punch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The original "Right Arm Of The Free World", without the weight. Grab this 7.62mm spewing baby if you like your extreme prejudice on a diet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A smaller, more versatile version of the widely used Fusil Automatique Leger, this carbine still packs a mighty punch.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The original "Right Arm Of The Free World", without the weight. Grab this 7.62mm spewing baby if you like your extreme prejudice on a diet.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The phrase, 'Help, I've FAL-len and I can't get up,' takes on a whole new meaning when this rifle is involved.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Belgian automatic rifle set a new standard in weaponry in the early 1950's. Its robust and reliable design made it simple to use and maintain, despite its tendency for excessive climbing in automatic mode.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The phrase, 'Help, I've FAL-len and I can't get up,' takes on a whole new meaning when this rifle is involved.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Belgian automatic rifle set a new standard in weaponry in the early 1950's. Its robust and reliable design made it simple to use and maintain, despite its tendency for excessive climbing in automatic mode.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Galil AR from Israel is related to Valmet M76. In fact, the first prototypes were designed from blueprints bought from Valmet.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Galil assault rifle is designed for heavy combat. Reliability and lethality in one package.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A heavily modified FAL, its compact size, portability, light weight, and power combine to make this a formidable battle rifle. Comes with an integral flashlight.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The FAL OSW is extremely versatile. Featuring picatinny rails and a folding stock, this carbine is for someone who means business.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A heavily modified FAL, its compact size, portability, light weight, and power combine to make this a formidable battle rifle. Comes with an integral flashlight.
The M14 is about as All-American as apple pie and the 4th of July. Any A-Team equipped with this rifle is gunning for victory.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Truly American through and through. This lighter automatic rifle offers multiple firing options, but is best kept locked at semi-automatic. Unfortunately, without the ability to change its barrel, it can overheat with sustained firing.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The M14 is about as All-American as apple pie and the 4th of July. Any A-Team equipped with this rifle is gunning for victory.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Truly American through and through. This lighter automatic rifle offers multiple firing options, but is best kept locked at semi-automatic. Unfortunately, without the ability to change its barrel, it can overheat with sustained firing.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 7.62mm NATO brother model to the SIG540, the SG542 is standard army issue in many nations. This version has folding stock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Swiss-made weapons are the standard for dependability, and the SG542 is no exception.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 7.62mm NATO brother model to the SIG540, the SG542 is standard army issue in many nations. This version has folding stock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Swiss-made weapons are the standard for dependability, and the SG542 is no exception.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 7.62mm NATO brother model to the SIG540, the SG542 is standard army issue in many nations. This version has retractable stock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Swiss-made weapons are the standard for dependability, and the SG542 is no exception.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 7.62mm NATO brother model to the SIG540, the SG542 is standard army issue in many nations. This version has retractable stock.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Swiss-made weapons are the standard for dependability, and the SG542 is no exception.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The SCAR is FN's newest offering into the military armament scene. The "H" stands for "Heavy", and refers to this version firing the 7.62mm NATO round. This is the sniper variant.
The 7.62x51mm version of the HK 416.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This is the 7.62x51mm version of Heckler & Koch's new HK 416.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed and produced in Singapore, the Ultimax 100 LMG line fires either drum or box magazines of 5.56mm ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reliable and comparatively light-weight, our ST Kinetics' Ultimaxes have been modified to accept 5.56mm Beta C-Mags. Comes with integral bipod and foregrip.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed and produced in Singapore, the Ultimax 100 LMG line fires either drum or box magazines of 5.56mm ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reliable and comparatively light-weight, our ST Kinetics' Ultimaxes have been modified to accept 5.56mm Beta C-Mags. Comes with integral bipod and foregrip.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Not as bulky or heavy as other LMG's, this gun still has a rate of fire that will frappe an enemy in no time.
ITEM.szBRDesc: HK has blessed us with their new versatile, multi-role squad machine gun. This version has the Bundeswehr grip with integrated optics.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Not as bulky or heavy as other LMG's, this gun still has a rate of fire that will frappe an enemy in no time.
ITEM.szBRDesc: HK has blessed us with their new versatile, multi-role squad machine gun. This version is outfitted with Picatinny rails.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 5.56 assault platform fills a variety of roles. Ever wanted to serve someone a lead salad? Point at enemy and pull trigger to taste.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Originally commissioned by the U.S. military, HK is now producing this 5.56 multi-role weapon for the highest bidder. Lucky you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The LMG version of the M4 assault rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Ares changed the M4 assault rifle to a LMG with a completely new upper receiver. Comes with a foregrip for better control during fullauto.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The LMG version of the M4 assault rifle.
The FN Minimi SPW (Special Purpose Weapon) is a lighter version of the standard Minimi, with Para type buttstock and rail adapters.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Special Forces version of the Minmi is smaller, lighter and easier to use, but can still kick major ass in every situation.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FN Minimi SPW (Special Purpose Weapon) is a lighter version of the standard Minimi, with Para type buttstock and rail adapters.
The latest LMG from HK is gas-operated, belt-fed, and air-cooled. An integral bipod and RIS rails give you lots of room for addons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: First shown in 2001 in London, the all-new MG43 continues HK's long standing tradition of fine weaponry. Comes standard with integral bipod. Since 2006 it's introduced in the Bundeswehr (German Army) as the MG4.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The latest LMG from HK is gas-operated, belt-fed, and air-cooled. An integral bipod and RIS rails give you lots of room for addons.
The latest Russian squad support weapon is this light machine gun. It brings new meaning to the concept of 'spray and pray.' The barrel is not quick-detachable. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Russian squad light automatic machine gun is simply a heavy-barreled version of the AK74 rifle. Its only drawback is that it tends to shoot the rifling out of its barrel within 5,000 rounds. The barrel is not quick-detachable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The latest Russian squad support weapon is this light machine gun. It brings new meaning to the concept of 'spray and pray.' The barrel is not quick-detachable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This Russian squad light automatic machine gun is simply a heavy-barreled version of the AK74 rifle. Its only drawback is that it tends to shoot the rifling out of its barrel within 5,000 rounds. The barrel is not quick-detachable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FN MAG was developed in the early 50s, and is still widely used today. It is very reliable and will work even in the worst conditions.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nail your enemies to the walls with the FN MAG. With a fire rate of 950 rounds per minute, you can draw a deadly line of fire everywhere you need it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FN MAG was developed in the early 50s, and is still widely used today. It is very reliable and will work even in the worst conditions.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Nail your enemies to the walls with the FN MAG. With a fire rate of 950 rounds per minute, you can draw a deadly line of fire everywhere you need it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The FN MAG was developed in the early 50s, and is still widely used today. It is very reliable and will work even in the worst conditions.
The FN MAG was developed in the early 50s, and is still widely used today. It is very reliable and will work even in the worst conditions.

The Pecheneg machine gun is an upgraded PKM. It's currently in limited production and has been issued on trial basis for some Russian troops in Chechnya. The barrel is not quick-detachable. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An upgraded PKM, the Pecheneg is slightly lighter and has a higher rate of fire. The barrel is not quick-detachable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Pecheneg machine gun is an upgraded PKM. It's currently in limited production and has been issued on trial basis for some Russian troops in Chechnya. The barrel is not quick-detachable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: An upgraded PKM, the Pecheneg is slightly lighter and has a higher rate of fire. The barrel is not quick-detachable.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The Pecheneg machine gun is an upgraded PKM. It's currently in limited production and has been issued on trial basis for some Russian troops in Chechnya. The barrel is not quick-detachable.
The Pecheneg machine gun is an upgraded PKM. It's currently in limited production and has been issued on trial basis for some Russian troops in Chechnya. The barrel is not quick-detachable.
The PKM is the Russian eqvivalent of the US M60. It's a universal MG that fires the heavy Russian 7.62x54mm round instead of the 7.62x39mm WP. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Around since the 1960s, the PKM is one of the most famous Russian MGs and is used all over the world. Now you have the chance to show your enemies that old school Soviet weapons are still superior!

ITEM.szItemDesc: The PKM is the Russian eqvivalent of the US M60. It's a universal MG that fires the heavy Russian 7.62x54mm round instead of the 7.62x39mm WP.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Around since the 1960s, the PKM is one of the most famous Russian MGs and is used all over the world. Now you have the chance to show your enemies that old school Soviet weapons are still superior!

ITEM.szItemDesc: The PKM is the Russian eqvivalent of the US M60. It's a universal MG that fires the heavy Russian 7.62x54mm round instead of the 7.62x39mm WP.
The PKM is the Russian eqvivalent of the US M60. It's a universal MG that fires the heavy Russian 7.62x54mm round instead of the 7.62x39mm WP.
This extremely common semi-automatic carbine weapon has seen action in almost every Communist country in the world. Can be field repaired.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Simonov self-loading SKS automatic rifle has a simple design and is easy to operate. Developed during WWII, it was later distributed to most Warsaw Pact members. Its only weak spot: it's a little heavy for its cartridge.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This extremely common semi-automatic carbine weapon has seen action in almost every Communist country in the world.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Simonov self-loading SKS automatic rifle has a simple design and is easy to operate. Developed during WWII, it was later distributed to most Warsaw Pact members. Its only weak spot: it's a little heavy for its cartridge.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed to slay "monsters" in a single blow, the .50 Beowulf rifle from Alexander Arms will make you a legend in your own time; heroic deeds are just moments away - let the ballads begin.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Use what the U.S Coast Guard uses: they know what they're doing.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Designed to slay "monsters" in a single blow, the .50 Beowulf rifle from Alexander Arms will make you a legend in your own time; heroic deeds are just moments away - let the ballads begin.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Use what the U.S Coast Guard uses: they know what they're doing.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This quintessential Russian sniper rifle has proven its worth on battlefields all over the globe.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The Dragunov has been deadly in the hands of snipers for nearly 40 years. The SVDS is the smaller, but heavier, cousin of the SVD.

ITEM.szItemDesc: A sniperized version of the Galil assault rifle. More like a DMR than a real sniper rifle.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This was a standard Galil, until someone decided to make a sniper rifle from it.

ITEM.szItemDesc: AR-15 variant chambered in .300 Whisper, with integral silencer and picatinny rails.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Both for hunting animals or larger prey, the whispering death's stunning accuray and stopping power will suprise you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: AR-15 variant chambered in .300 Whisper, with integral silencer and picatinny rails.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Both for hunting animals or larger prey, the whispering death's stunning accuray and stopping power will suprise you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This light machine gun, also known as the C-9 and M-249, has been known to moonlight as a beefed-up assault rifle. This version is chambered in 6.8x43mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Reputed for its reliability, this Belgian machine gun is gas operated, with a simple rotating bolt system. Its design was adopted by the US Army as the M249 machine gun. This version is chambered in 6.8x43mm.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This light machine gun, also known as the C-9 and M-249, has been known to moonlight as a beefed-up assault rifle. This version is chambered in 6.8x43mm.

The PPK-20 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics. This version can fire overpressured armor-piercing 7N31 9x19mm ammunition.

The AK-12U combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers. This version fires 5.45x39mmm from a 50-round quad stack magazine.

Fresh from prototype state, the 7.62x39mm shortened variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

Fresh from prototype state, the 9x39mm shortened variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

Fresh from prototype state, the 5.45x39mm variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

Fresh from prototype state, the 7.62x39mm variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

Fresh from prototype state, the 9x39mm variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

Fresh from prototype state, the semi-automatic shotgun version of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics.
The RPK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics. This version fires from a 5.45x39mm 95-shot drum.
The SVK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock and improved ergonomics. This version uses 10-shot dragunov magazines.
This AR-15 derivate from Alexander Arms is chambered in 6.5x38mm Grendel. With its 20" barrel it can serve as designated marskman rifle for extended combat distances.
A AR-15 derivate from Alexander Arms, chambered in 6.5x38mm Grendel. This Mid-Length Carbine is suited for medium combat distances.
This AR-15 based gun is very short and extremely silent, while still firing the full power cartridge 7.62x35mm Blackout.
A shorter version of the standard HK 416, chambered in 7.62x35mm Blackout.
Combine the best features of the G36 and the M4 with Heckler & Koch's HK416. This variant is chambered in 7.62x35mm Blackout.
This has a barrel that is slightly longer than on the standard HK 416 and is chambered in 7.62x35mm Blackout.
The DMR variant of the HK 416, chambered in 7.62x35mm Blackout.
Developed in the 1960s for airborne troops, this launcher has a telescopic sight, a integral bipod and and can be disassembled for easier transportation.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Developed in the 1960s for airborne troops, this launcher has a telescopic sight, a integral bipod and and can be disassembled for easier transportation.
