This drum holds 71 rounds of 9mm ball ammunition. Although small, this ammo travels at rather high velocities, making it the preferred sidearm round to many military and law enforcement personnel.
ITEM.szBRDesc: These 71 rounds of fine quality 115 grain Fiocchi round tip ammunition are ideal for anyone looking for an economical means of personal defense.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This drum contains 71 rounds of 9mm federal-135-grain hollow point ammo. While its armor piercing capabilities are questionable, its tendency to expand in tissue more than makes up for its weaknesses.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 71-round drum of COR-BON 9mm Jacketed Hollow Point ammunition is truly the top of the line. It's a definite deterrent against any unarmored assailant.

ITEM.szItemDesc: AET ammo has expansion and armor piercing capabilities for double the punch, but can make your weapon somewhat unreliable.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When your hollow points fall off the enemies armor and the armor piercers do not deal enough damage, then it's time to pack these puppies.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Glaser ammunition has double the impact of standard hollow point ammo. Unfortunately, it also has twice as much difficulty penetrating armor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Seventy-one rounds of frangible fun. All of the man-stopping power, none of the over-penetration.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Tracer ammunition in 9mm. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Keeping track of ranging and shot placement has never been as fun or cost effective.

ITEM.szItemDesc: High quality ball ammunition to boost weapon range and performance.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Better range more than makes up for the increased cost of match grade ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The bullets in this drum have been specially "cold-loaded" to reduce muzzle noise at a moderate cost to stopping power.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The bullets in this drum have been specially "cold-loaded" to reduce muzzle noise at a moderate cost to stopping power.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The hollow point bullets in this drum have been specially "cold-loaded" to reduce muzzle noise at a moderate cost to stopping power.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Enjoy expansion power and quieter firing with cold-loaded hollow point ammunition.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This drum contains 71 hardened steel rounds of 9mm ammunition. Even though this round easily cuts through light body armor, it doesn't cause as much damage as the hollow point version.
ITEM.szBRDesc: They've got Kevlar? Have no fear with this drum; it's brimming with 71 rounds of hardened steel. This low power pistol round is your best bet against Kevlar.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The armor piercing bullets in this drum have been specially "cold-loaded" to reduce muzzle noise at a moderate cost to stopping power.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The tactical benefits of quieter armor piercing bullets speak for themselves.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russian 7N21 overpressure variant of the common 9x19mm Parabellum round, with hardened steel core. While increasing stopping power and muzzle velocity, this ammunition will damage your weapon, if it wasn't constructed to withstand the increased pressure.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This drum contains 18 overpressure armor-piercing bullets. While increasing stopping power and muzzle velocity, this ammunition will damage your weapon, if it wasn't constructed to withstand the increased pressure.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Russian 7N31 overpressure variant of the common 9x19mm Parabellum round, with hardened steel core. While increasing stopping power and muzzle velocity, this ammunition will severe damage your weapon, if it wasn't constructed to withstand the increased pressure.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This drum contains 18 overpressure armor-piercing bullets. While increasing stopping power and muzzle velocity, this ammunition will severe damage your weapon, if it wasn't constructed to withstand the increased pressure.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 6.8 SPC hollow point ammo in this 160-round belt is designed to maximize nerve shock and blood loss.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The 6.8 SPC hollow point ammo in this 160-round belt is designed to maximize nerve shock and blood loss.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Standard issue 6.8 SPC full metal jacket ammunition in a 160-round ammo belt.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Standard issue 6.8 SPC full metal jacket ammunition in a 160-round ammo belt.

ITEM.szItemDesc: With this belt of 6.8mm tracer, accurate rapid-fire is assured.
ITEM.szBRDesc: The perfect audio-visual display for any tactical operation.

ITEM.szItemDesc: While it might not match your outfit, this 6.8mm belt is Match grade for pinpoint accuracy, leaving you dressed to kill.
ITEM.szBRDesc: While it might not match your outfit, this 6.8mm belt is Match grade for pinpoint accuracy, leaving you dressed to kill.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 50-round magazine contains 5.45 jacketed hollow point ammunition. It features the combined effect of mushrooming on impact, and tumbling within its target to create enormous wound cavities.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Need a quick sure-shot way to collect on a life insurance policy? These 50 rounds of 5.45mm Hollow Point ammunition will show you the money in no time at all.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This 50-round magazine holds 5.45 light full metal jacket ammo. Its jacketing not only improves its ability to punch through walls, but it can tear through multiple bodies as well.
ITEM.szBRDesc: One of our hottest commodities is this 50-round mag of 'acquired' Russian 5.45mm Full Metal Jacket ammunition. This round is guaranteed to make you the death of any party.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Tracer ammunition in 5.45mm caliber. In addition to the light show, tracer ammo adds a bonus to hit in burst and autofire modes.
ITEM.szBRDesc: "Walking" burst fire onto a target has never been so easy with this 50-round magazine of 5.45mm ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Added expansion in a quiet 50 round package.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Extra punch minus the noise with this 5.45mm ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pump em' full of holes without waking up the countryside. Cold loaded ammo is 40% quieter than standard full metal jacket rounds.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This 50-round magazine of ammunition will leave your enemies as cold as the rounds themselves, and is as silent as an Artic wind.

ITEM.szItemDesc: This drum contains 95 rounds of 5.45 Warsaw Pact hollow point ammo. Although use of this round against light armored opponents can sway a battle in your favor, it's less effective against heavy armor.
ITEM.szBRDesc: When killing them is simply not enough. A huge 95-round drum of 5.45x39mm Hollow Point is a great way to send the point home in true brain splattering style.

ITEM.szItemDesc: When its time to end the fire fight, snap in a drum of hard hitting 5.45x39mm.
ITEM.szBRDesc: This long-serving heavy cartridge comes in convenient drums.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Put bursts from your RPK-12 on target with this 95-round drum of tracers.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Tracer ammunition helps anyone walk fire onto targets with deadly precision.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Subsonic hollow point rounds for use with 5.45x39mm Warsaw-Pact weapons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: If you own an AK and want to be a silent warrior, then this ammo is for you.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Subsonic full metal jacket rounds for use with 5.45x39mm Warsaw-Pact weapons.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Silent light full metal jacket ammo for Eastern Bloc guns.

ITEM.szItemDesc: The 300 AAC/7.62x35mm Blackout cartridge offers a similar performance like the russian 7.62x39mm, while remaining compatible with AR-15 type firearms. This magazine holds 30 hollowpoint rounds.
The 300 AAC/7.62x35mm Blackout cartridge offers a similar performance like the russian 7.62x39mm, while remaining compatible with AR-15 type firearms. This magazine holds 30 full metal jacket rounds.
The 300 AAC/7.62x35mm Blackout cartridge offers a similar performance like the russian 7.62x39mm, while remaining compatible with AR-15 type firearms. This magazine holds 30 match grade rounds.

The 300 AAC/7.62x35mm Blackout cartridge offers a similar performance like the russian 7.62x39mm, while remaining compatible with AR-15 type firearms. This magazine holds 30 cold loaded hollowpoint rounds.

The 300 AAC/7.62x35mm Blackout cartridge offers a similar performance like the russian 7.62x39mm, while remaining compatible with AR-15 type firearms. This magazine holds 30 cold loaded jacketed rounds.
This 100-round Beta C-Mag is filled with 300 AAC Blackout rounds. The hollowpoint bullets are designed to maximize nerve shock and blood loss.
This 100-round Beta C-Mag is filled with 300 AAC Blackout rounds. This round's steel penetrator makes it possible to beat all but the best in today's body armor.
This 100-round Beta C-Mag is filled with 300 AAC Blackout rounds in match grade quality.
More stopping power with less noise is the key feature of cold loaded HP ammo.
100 rounds of cold loaded 300 AAC Blackout FMJ enables quiet hosing of hapless hostiles.

The 300 AAC/7.62x35mm Blackout cartridge offers a similar performance like the russian 7.62x39mm, while remaining compatible with AR-15 type firearms. The hollowpoint bullets are designed to maximize nerve shock and blood loss.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Extra punch minus the noise with this .300 Blackout ammo.
ITEM.szBRDesc: Extra punch minus the noise with this .300 Blackout ammo.

ITEM.szItemDesc: Pump em' full of holes without waking up the countryside. Cold loaded ammo is 40% quieter than standard full metal jacket rounds.

Fresh from prototype state, the carbine variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

Fresh from prototype state, the rifle-length variant of the AK-12 combines the reliable and combat proven kalashnikov piston system with picatinny rails, adjustable stock, improved ergonomics and interchangeable barrel lengths and calibers.

ITEM.szItemDesc: One of the strengths of the AR-15 weapon system is the ability to be easily converted into different calibers and different types of weapons in very short time and without complicated tools. This version has a fixed stock and only the mode single fire.
